Flip is Silly's best friend, he's her hero. He suggests at times things Silly can't say and he redirects and shows her things she needs to learn. He is lovable, yet has a bit of sarcastic humor.So! Where do we go from here? Silly and Flip have so much to do! Yes! my art started as an accident, but where I'm at today is no accident. I have spent most of my days off and all evenings building what I have now. I recently received an award and my art was chosen for this year's theme in Portland at the Festival of Nations. This drawing below is that art piece.I will be displaying my art at a local Panera Bread Restaurant and this February I have an art exhibit that runs the entire month. What continually stops my momentum is a lack of funds. Everything I built has been mostly hard work and my time and pay as I go. I want to take Silly Business to the next level. I want to create an inventory of my art products and begin stocking  businesses with my creations and with your help I can do this.With the funds I raise I will first deliver to you all your perks in time for you to even give as gifts this holiday. Next, I will print and frame all my art for my art show in February. I need to print and frame 15-20 art pieces for display and sale. This will cost me between $1200-$1500. Many of the pieces on display will sell and I'm very excited to be able to quickly replace the pieces as they sell, but I can only do that in a timely way by having the money to pre-print them all. Next, I will create an inventory of my greeting cards and be able to sell them in businesses. I have many requests for coffee mugs, stationary and t-shirt prints that I will be able to create and make available. If this campaign super exceeds what I'm hoping for then it will allow me to purchase equipment and technology to even further develop Silly Business. Here are the details on the current perks I am offering. I will update as they sell out. $5 Post cards. Thank you and signed and mailed to YOU! 





$25~ My Silly Flip-book
20 pages filled with my most popular art and messages. This is an awesome collectible piece. There will only be 100 available. I will sign and number each one. $50~ Limited Edition Signed Print"Hearts A Mess" 8 x 10 

Only 25 of these prints are available. Printed on Hahnemuhle fine art paper with archival inks. 
COA, Certificate of Authenticity included.

$100~ Silly Bundle, includes two 8 X 10 prints. "Flip Who" and "I'mPossible".



Printed on Hahnemuhle fine art paper with archival inks. 
COA, Certificate of Authenticity included for both prints.


$175~ "Paint Your World" Plexiglass Print

11 x 14  Very limited signed edition print.Only 10 available. "Unique" print.
Printed on Hahnemuhle fine art paper with archival inks. 

The "sandwich" combination of front and back mounting has the look of a floating frameless presentation. Plexiglass on the front, print in the middle, and the back is mounted to Dibond. Lastly, a backing cleat is attached in order to hang the piece for a modern and sleek display. 
Only 10 available.
Printed on Hahnemuhle fine art pearl paper with archival inks.
COA, Certificate of Authenticity included.

COA, Certficate of Authenticity included. 
Please don't forget I am offering FREE to everyone that shares my campaign a digital piece of my art to use as a screensaver or wallpaper for any of your phones, laptops or tablets. Please email me at sillystiks@gmail.com, put in the subject line "screensaver" and at the end of my campaign I will send you a downloadable version. Super thanks to you all!!!

story:
Short Summary

We are a small family farm in southern Maine with a really great herd of Nigerian Dwarf dairy goats. As we've gotten more serious about making things with our goat's milk, mainly cheese, we've been invited to participate in several local farmer's markets - and we've sadly had to decline. In order to sell our fantastic dairy goods, we need a license.

We have invested a lot of time and money in getting together a herd of the very best Nigerian Dwarf dairy goats available. We are incredibly passionate about our goats and the milk they produce. We love making cheeses, caramel, fudge and more.

If we are able to get the things we need to get licensed it would mean we would finally be able to attend local farmer's markets with our products and work on getting them into stores. It would mean we could finally start to realize the possibility of making our farm a full time venture for the whole family.


What We Need & What You Get

What we need:

$1,988 - Commercial grade milk machine. This machine can milk two goats at once, and has the option of small teat cups for Nigerians, and silicone hoses that won't stiffen up in the cold. Since milking is mostly a one man operation at this point, this machine will be essential as we have more goats coming into milk to meet the milk production levels we will need. 


$400 - Herd testing. In order to sell RAW milk products, which we are very passionate about, we have to have our entire herd tested by a veterinarian for Tuberculosis and Brucellosis and the results submitted to the state for approval. Just for the vet to come out to the farm is a $100 charge.

$400 - New milking stand. In order to milk two goats at once with the new machine, we will need a second milk stand. Since our current stand is a very ammature construction, we would love to be able to buy a really nice stand from a friend of ours who hand crafts some amazing milk stands, which will hold up for a very long time. 

$250 - Upgrading the milking area. All of the walls need serious painting so they can be non-porous and withstand being wiped down and sanitized regularly. We will also need to put up plywood sheets in the ceiling to prevent any dust from filtering down from the hay loft.  Non-porous flooring will also have to be installed under the milking area so that it can be properly sanitized as well. All of this is to meet state regulated standards.

$300 - The rest. This goes towards small equipment like storage containers, milk filters, cheese cultures, utensils, sanitizer, packaging, and all of the other odds and ends that make the magic happen. 

$134 - 4% IndieGoGo fee

Rewards!

In order to show our gratitude for your contribution, we've come up with some really fun and exciting rewards, with a lot of options. Check them out!

The Goal

If we don't reach out hoped-for goal, the money we do raise will all go towards funding the milk machine, as this is our most critical need. If we happen to go over goal by some miracle, we will put additional funds towards fencing for expanding the goat pastures and building materials for expanding goat housing.  

The Impact

Getting our dairy licence would be a huge achievement for our small farm, and would allow us to bring our passion for artisan cheeses and other fantastic goat milk products. We have come a long way in a very short time and continue to build and grow our farm in order to bring fresh, local, organic and hand-raised products to our community. 
We want people to be excited to be a part of journey, and we maintain a farm website, a blog and a Facebook page so that people can can keep up with all of our progress and small victories. 

    Risks & Challenges

    Getting licensed by the state is a challenge with a lot of risks involved. There is always the possibility that we get everything in place and then run into roadblocks with milk testing, sanitation or other unforeseen issues that may be brought to light on inspection day. However, even if we don't get licensed on our first visit, we will continue to make the necessary steps towards achieving our goal, no matter what. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      We are cash poor, so we fully understand that other people are in the same boat. If you can just help spread the word and share the link to our campaign, that would be a tremendous help.

story:
You get it NOW!

We are offering some floatastic Perk Packs for your contributions and support! You can choose some cool FLOATEEZ promotional items or an assortment of  actual FLOATEEZ Water Floats, including our Featured 2-for-1 Perk Pack. There is even a Perk Pack that includes the chance to become a FLOATEEZ marketing model.  We currently have product IN STOCK - ready to deliver to you NOW!  Perks will be shipped to you whether we hit our campaign goal or not!

 ____________________________________________________________________________

What is the #1 selling pool toy in the industry?  The pool noodle.

What is a pool noodle?  Those inexpensive floating tubes that people use while swimming and relaxing in the water.

Why are they the #1 selling flotation device on the planet?  Because they are inexpensive and they float!  That’s it!

Well, FLOATEEZ Water Floats are most certainly NOT pool noodles!

 

World's most Innovative water float!

Greenan Design Group LLC, the inventors of FLOATEEZ Water Floats, have taken the simplicity of the pool noodle and created a multi-functional water float and more!  FLOATEEZ Water Logz feature innovative oval construction and an inter-connecting expandable design to bring a whole new fun factor to floatation recreation – with connect-ability, durability, portability and creativity!  FLOATEEZ is more than just a floatation device – it’s the ULTIMATE new way of interacting while in the water.

 

Changing Industry through Innovation

Greenan Design Group, LLC was founded in 2010 by Thomas Greenan and Manda Northcutt.  Our initial product design goal was to take the #1 selling pool float toy on the planet and make it functional!  For the past four years we have gone from a simple napkin sketch of our first water float concept, through endless hours of product testing, working prototypes, research, proof of concepts, now to a final patent-pending product that is currently selling in the market place.  FLOATEEZ Water Float products are designed for a purpose: to be an affordable, functional, expandable water float, without any additional dangerous parts, ropes, plastic connectors or hassles.

 

 

World's most versatile custom fit water floats!

FLOATEEZ is the most versatile water float on the planet!  Lay on your back or
lay on your tummy, sit upright, totally stabilized, free to move about, swim, relax… you get the idea!  FLOATEEZ Water Logz are OVAL not round!  Our custom profiles are extruded in the form of an ellipse, instead of a circle like a regular pool noodle, which promotes more stability and durability.  Our expandable design allows the user to select more or less buoyancy in the water creating your own unique water float, floating chair, canoe, raft, 3-D forts – you name it!  FLOATEEZ water float creations are limited only by one’s imagination!

 

FLOATEEZ are on the GO!

FLOATEEZ Water Logz last for years - not seasons!  UV additives during the extrusion process create a longer lasting float which resists color fading, salt water and harsh pool chemicals.  FLOATEEZ Water Floats come complete with a reusable carry-all mesh storage bag, making transportation and storage of FLOATEEZ a breeze.  The bag-factor makes it like no other water float on the market!  Place your FLOATEEZ Logz in the bag after use, hang it up and in minutes it’s dry, ready to go!  Our easy-to-carry bag with shoulder strap allows you to take your FLOATEEZ with you in your vehicle, store in boats, pool houses or pool storage containers.

 

FLOATEEZ nation is growing!

Since officially launching our products to market in July 2014, FLOATEEZ Water Floats have been available for purchase in local marinas, pool supply stores and specialty stores from Galveston to Dallas/Ft. Worth, TX.  FLOATEEZ has been featured on ABC/KVUE News TV with Quita Culpepper’s segment "Does it Work Wednesdays," receiving an awesome Two Thumbs Up rating!  In August 2014, we set a World Record for Longest Inter-Connected Water Float at the Twin Lakes Family YMCA in Cedar Park, TX.  Adults are ecstatic over its functionality and portability, while kids are saying “We can connect with our friends!” and “They’re like Legos on water!”

 

 

FLOATEEZ Marketing / Sales / Flogistics

Greenan Design Group’s primary marketing goal starting Spring 2015 is Direct Response Television Marketing on major television networks across the sunny state of Florida.  As the year and sales progress, we will grow our marketing and media campaign North and West across the United States.  Our marketing efforts also include strategic social media campaigns, social event campaigns and National Press Releases to promote our current FLOATEEZ partner sales throughout the 2015 calendar year.

Picking up where we left off in 2014, we are projecting to add up to 100 partnering specialty store locations in Texas and Florida in 2015 where you may purchase our FLOATEEZ Water Float products.  We have sold just over 600 units in just over 6 weeks this past summer through our partnering specialty stores and our online web store.

Greenan Design Group's manufacturing, fabrication and final packaging of FLOATEEZ Water Floats is conducted in Cookeville, TN.  We also offer Direct to Store shipping out of our warehouse in Central Texas for our current clientele.

Since release of FLOATEEZ to market in July 2014, sales data has proven that FLOATEEZ Water Floats can become THE top selling water float pool toy in major retail and a permanent staple in the industry!

 

Why we need YOUR support!

We are projecting small retail introductory purchase orders which will coincide with the airing of FLOATEEZ television ad sales on major television networks throughout the 2015 calendar year.  We also project major retail introductory purchase orders for Spring 2016, understanding major retail conducts their buying 10 to 12 months in advance.  In order to fulfill these retail purchase orders for 2015 and 2016, we need to scale up our operations for mass production.

Funds received through this campaign will be used to increase marketing efforts and expand our production ability by building new tooling dies, die cut boards, print plate setups for display/ship boxes, third party storage and logistics, etc.  Essentially, the requirements to be able to manufacture product on a major retail level and be ready for Spring 2016.

Any funds received over our goal will go towards our next production run.  We have so many awesome major retail prospects wanting to buy once we show continued growth, branding and sales.  With your backing, you can help us Reinvent Floatation Recreation and bring FLOATEEZ Water Floats to a national retail store near you!

 

Where are your contributions going?

The crowd funding goal is $33,879, which pays for the costs associated with delivering FLOATEEZ Water Floats to the market place in extremely large quantities.  Your support as a FLOATEEZ backer will enable us to float into Big Box stores across the United States in the coming seasons…

 

PERK PACKS

We pay all of the shipping costs on our Perk Packs!

     

 

FLOATEEZ Fun Facts:

Fact:  Over 30 million pool noodles are extruded and sold through retail in the United States each year, an estimated 45 million worldwide.  Over 80% of them are discarded each year lasting no more than one season.

Fact:  FLOATEEZ holds the World Record for Longest Inter-ConneXted water float, just over 293 feet long.

Fact:  Floating on FLOATEEZ helps reduce stress. Not only can they be relaxing, they can also be used for low-impact water exercises, rehabilitation or physical therapy. 

Fact:  FLOATEEZ is the only custom fit water float on the planet, NEVER needs air and NEVER deflates!

Fact:  For kids, FLOATEEZ can be used to problem-solve, experiment with math and science concepts and strengthen their physical and social skills. Not to mention, enhancing their creative skills! 

Fact:  FLOATEEZ one of a kind expandable design allows you to connect with your friends.  Think about it!

Fact:  Ultra Violet (UV) additives during our extrusion process make FLOATEEZ last for YEARS!  Pool noodles are engineered to break down after one season.

Fact:  Greenan Design Group products are always MADE IN THE USA!  Never overseas!  Nope, NEVER!

Fact:  We have more up our sleeves!  Greenan Design Group has 5 more innovative FLOATEEZ products on the tooling blocks.  Our goal is to dominate the water float marketplace!  Oh yeah!

Spread the WORD!

We do understand that not everyone has the ability to contribute with money.  And that's A-Ok!  Just sharing our campaign link or talking about our products with your friends and family is appreciated.  Your voices are the springboards to our success! This is your opportunity to promote the FLOATEEZ brand within your own social communities.  Share, tweet, Like, email, forward, whatever you can do to get our name out there! 

Thank you for taking the time to view our campaign.  Don't forget to click on our Gallery to see even more floatastic fun photos and videos!

We would enjoy hearing from you and encourage you to contact us with questions.

story:
We are farmers at heart.

Zasaka uses market-based approaches to help farmers create lasting income. We introduce affordable, appropriate technologies and work with farmers to grow and market high-value crops through local entrepreneurs.

In the past year, we have:

  1. Established a crop diversification program with 40 farmers in Zambia’s Eastern Province.
  2. Raised maize yields for these farmers by an estimated 75%
  3. Introduced 5 tested technologies to reduce labor demands and increase farm profitability.

This farmer group has seen 2X increase in income from their increased yields and access to new crop markets and technologies. Plus, 100% of these farmers have re-elected to join the program next year!

  

Through Zasaka and our team of lead farmers, this group will grow to reach 800 farmers in just 3 years! Help us reach our next group of 40 amazing farmers and watch us grow! Make a contribution today. 

We are Zasaka's founders

Sunday was born and raised in Zambia. His passion for alleviating poverty, improving the lives of farmers, and gender equity drove him to work for organizations like Heifer International and get his degree in Developmental Studies from Zambia Catholic University.

Carl grew up on a wheat farm in Northern Idaho and farming is in his blood. He has worked with subsistence farmers in several countries around the world, but he now calls Zambia home. At UC Davis he studied International Agricultural Development focused on soil management (how dirty!) and entrepreneurship. 

 

We truly love legumes. We monkey around with maize. We have fun on the farm. Thank you for supporting Zasaka! 

Scaling impact

The new group of 40 farmers we will reach through your support, has 1 lead farmer (we call them farmer-preneurs), and 1 apprentice. This seed group will grow to reach 800 farmers in just 3 years!

Here’s how it’s done: 

Our partners help by nominating local, entrepreneurial lead farmers to be farmer-preneurs and apprentices. Our trainings help these leaders build the capacity of their community of farmers, and increase their own earnings.

Your funds go to getting the technologies, trainings, and crops in the hands of these farmers. Check out the details on corn shellers, cowpea seeds, water pumps, and more, plus the awesome rewards you will get for supporting our work. The product catalogue is on our website.

Risks and challenges

Working with rural farmers comes with risks & challenges. The weather can affect the growing season as well as our team’s ability to reach every farmer. Prices of and access to seeds and other farming inputs can fluctuate over time. We work to reduce risk by strategies including:

  • investing in the training and leadership of our farmer-preneurs,
  • creating distribution and training partnerships,
  • carefully mapping our growth in the region,
  • promoting crop diversity while including improved practices for staple crops.
Without these funds, Zasaka will continue to grow, but much more slowly. We create revenue through the new technologies we have introduced in agrodealer shops and the sales of our crops. Our business model is working, and we need your help to grow quickly to serve more farmers.

Spread the word!

Let others know about Zasaka and how they can help!

Tweet your support
Post on Facebook
Visit our website

Make your contribution by selecting a perk level -->

Thank you! 
From Zambia with love,
Team Zasaka

- Zambia's beautiful Eastern Provence, photo by Dimitri Zakharov
Big thanks to Josh Hyde, LoFu Productions for our video!
story_txt:
We are farmers at heart.



Zasaka uses market-based approaches to help farmers create lasting income. We introduce affordable, appropriate technologies and work with farmers to grow and market high-value crops through local entrepreneurs.

In the past year, we have:



Established a crop diversification program with
40 farmers in Zambia’s Eastern Province.

Raised maize yields for these farmers by an estimated 75%

Introduced 5 tested technologies to reduce labor demands and increase farm profitability.



This farmer group has seen 2X increase in income from their
increased yields and access to new crop markets and technologies. Plus, 100% of
these farmers have re-elected to join the program next year!
  

Through Zasaka and our team of lead farmers, this group will grow to reach 800 farmers in just 3 years! Help us reach our next group of 40 amazing farmers and watch us grow! Make a
contribution today. 
   

We are Zasaka's founders
Sunday was born and raised in Zambia. His passion for alleviating poverty, improving the lives of farmers, and gender equity drove him to work for organizations like Heifer International and get his degree in Developmental Studies from Zambia Catholic University.
Carl grew up on a wheat farm in Northern Idaho and farming is in his blood. He has worked with subsistence farmers in several countries around the world, but he now calls Zambia home. At UC Davis he studied International Agricultural Development focused on soil management (how dirty!) and entrepreneurship. 




 
We truly love legumes. We monkey around with maize. We have fun on the farm. Thank you for supporting Zasaka! 
Scaling impact
The new group of 40 farmers we will reach through your support, has 1 lead farmer (we call
them farmer-preneurs), and 1 apprentice. This seed group will grow to reach 800 farmers in just 3 years!
Here’s how it’s done: 





Our partners help by nominating local, entrepreneurial lead farmers to be farmer-preneurs and apprentices. Our trainings help these leaders build the capacity of their community of farmers, and increase their own earnings.


Your funds go to getting the technologies, trainings, and
crops in the hands of these farmers. Check out the details on corn shellers,
cowpea seeds, water pumps, and more, plus the awesome rewards you will get for
supporting our work. The product catalogue is on our website.

    Risks and challenges

Working with rural farmers comes with risks &
challenges. The weather can affect the growing season as well as our team’s
ability to reach every farmer. Prices of and access to seeds and other farming
inputs can fluctuate over time. We work to reduce risk by strategies including:



investing in the training and leadership of our
farmer-preneurs,


creating distribution and training partnerships,


carefully mapping our growth in the region,

promoting crop diversity while including
improved practices for staple crops.

Without these funds, Zasaka will continue to grow, but much more slowly. We create revenue through the new technologies we have introduced in agrodealer shops and the sales of our crops. Our business model is working, and we need your help to grow quickly to serve more farmers.

    Spread the word! Let others know about Zasaka and how they can help!
Tweet your support
 Post on FacebookVisit our website

Make your contribution by selecting a perk level -->
Thank you! 
From Zambia with love,Team Zasaka

- Zambia's beautiful Eastern Provence, photo by Dimitri Zakharov
Big thanks to Josh Hyde, LoFu Productions for our video!

story:
So what's Rep My Vote about?

Would you hire anyone based on whether you recognize their face, their name, or where their name falls on a list?  Of course not you'll probably ask for a resume, references and an interview.  Then you will likely compare them to others you've interviewed to determine whether they are the best candidate.

Political parties were built to support voters in this process, but over the years the sheer number of candidates and the complexity of their work has made a mess of it all. Rep My Vote (RMV) is being built to fill this critical gap for you.  WE the people are disengaged, apathetic and just frustrated with how we are being represented.  Candidates spend more time fundraising (to be heard), than governing or legislating.  Sound bites and pundits rule our airwaves.

Well, if you're tired of it; help us do something about it.  I'm not interested in being a candidate for office, but I am passionate about getting the most out of our political system.  I've registered voters, volunteered for campaigns, attended conventions, but those activities only worked within the system; RMV is seeking a paradigm shift.  Since 1776 we've not really changed the way voters engage in the electoral process.  Voters hope to hear from candidates; candidates are struggling to access voters, but until now there’s never been a centralized location for candidates and voters to meet.

Today, we are 320,000,000 Americans strong; only 725 thousand or 0.25% of us are elected to an office.  Most of us are at least familiar with our national or statewide candidates (i.e. POTUS, Congress, Governors), but we are far less familiar with our local, county and municipal candidates and representatives.  These are the folks that actually determine your local tax rates, if your legal suite is substantiated, and whether roads are repaired.

We need your support to finalize the beta Mobile App which is launching in time for the 2015 Texas Primaries.  The free app will make it easy for any voter to access and review their candidates’ resumes and references, to see how they compare to others, and to save voting preferences.  You can print a voting card or just save it to your online profile.

What We Need & What You Get

Here’s what we need:

  • The total amount needed for start-up is ≈ $700k

    • $150k for the mobile app integration

    • $150k for general operating expenses

    • $400k for staff and contracted workers

The amount we’re looking to raise now is $40k.  This will help us finalize the Beta Version of the mobile app for a limited launch in Texas

  • Your perks are sure to impress your friends& neighbors. Additionally, you should note that they will become collector’s items. Imagine 4 score and 7 years from now, generations of voters will ask where were you when… and you can show them your pin, tote bag, or framed t-shirt!  How cool is it that your name will be recorded in the official records?  Your generous gifts will never be forgotten.

  • All funds raise will be applied to the development

Risks & Challenges

The risks associated with building this tool are real and the challenges are great.  No one has ever created a central repository of voters and candidates. 

  1. Security of information is our highest priority. To ensure the highest level of protection we ask you for minimal personal info

  2. The amount of data required to pull this off is ridiculous.  Which is one big reason no one else has done it.  Most people have attempted to start at the national level, but have all failed to get local.  Our approach is to simple you’ll control the inputs

  3. Moving the needle on voter engagement can be like climbing Mt. Everest.  We’re attacking Texas first because we know there are a lot of people and most don’t turn-out to vote.  We’ll use this market to fix bugs and fine tune our ground strategy

Other Ways You Can Help:

Perhaps you can’t donate now but still want to assist:

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and share this campaign with your social media friends

  • Direct your local politician to our app, so you can connect with them more easily.

Thank you!  You’ve likely already done great things in your community and your donation supports you’re status as a community leader and gives us an opportunity to create real change!

story:
A PLANNER DESIGNED FOR MOMS

WHO WANT TO HAVE FUN

AND WANT TO KEEP AND CHERISH

THEIR DAILY MEMORIES

 

DELIVERY: end of FEBRUARY

Some of the Main Layouts/Features:

15-month Weekly Planner
Personal & Work To-Do Lists
Appointment Calendar
Scheduling Areas
Expense Records
Kid Designated Areas (First time in a Planner!)
Monthly Astrological Analysis (First time in a Planner!)
"Void of Course" Moon Phases" (First time in a Planner!)
More than 60 Recipes based on the Mediterranean Diet (First time in a Planner!)

If my campaign is funded above the amount of USD 30,000 all planners printed will be accompanied by a collectible slipcase that will allow you to keep your planner elegantly on your bookshelf forever and cherish your memories.

This version of EASY LIFE Planner is dedicated to mothers and is designed in such a way to help them enjoy their role as a mom, stay happy, good humored and connected with their children and family.

EASY LIFE Planner is a 15-month, weekly planner unlike ANY planner you’ve ever used before and is designed in such a way to challenge the scheduling skills of even the most organized moms. Beautifully organized and colored, it provides daily tools that will assist mothers to organize their daily schedule, keep their children's itinerary in order and have fun in scheduling their day through.



I want the PERFECT PLANNER for Moms - DO YOU?

In my career, both during my studies for the MPhil in Management at University of Cambridge, UK and later as a top-bank Project Finance Manager in leading financial institutions, like HSBC, I’ve been Head of significant economic projects and managed their successful completion. After having my second daughter, though, and being under the pressure of daily tasks, work and family, I was caught up in a daily routine and realized that there was no real fun in scheduling my daily program anymore.

I knew that by organizing my tasks, I could stay on top of the game and if I could find a tool that could help me schedule exciting things for my daily program I could add that extra sparkle that was missing... so I started looking for a planner.

Most printed planners in the market were simplified. They all lacked functionality and NONE could really help me get myself back. Digital planners, on the other hand, could not even get close. Shouldn't there be a planner planner dedicated to moms? One that could help making motherhood more "fun"? One that could transform the not-so-hot sides of being a mom, to brighter, more enjoyable realities?

The answer was, and still is (if you go out and start looking): NO! No, planners, no agendas, no... nothing dedicated to moms. At least, no serious planners with goal-setting pages, but plenty of simple planners with romantic sketches and colors.

So, I decided that I had to make my own planner. And this is how EASY LIFE Planner for Moms was born. Through my experience as a mom of two, a business woman and a wife, but also by joining the experience of numerous mothers who worked with me on this project, for more than 18-months, through emails, comments and thoughts, I created the EASY LIFE Planner in such a way that will make every mom enjoy her daily "routine" and be able to see the glass “half full” instead of “half empty”. 

I am so convinced that EASY LIFE Planner will improve every mom’s life, that I am giving the full PDF version completely free to all of you that will share this campaign on any social media! Kindly send a screenshot or link of your share to indiegogo@easy-life-planner.com

Share the EASY LIFE Planner for Moms on Facebook!

Share the EASY LIFE Planner for Moms on Twitter!

I WILL DONATE

Half a dollar from every planner sold will be donated to "SAVE THE CHILDREN" and "RAINBOW CONNECTION" organizations. Should you like to donate more please add the amount you wish to donate to the perk's amount. The names of those backers, who will donate, will be mentioned analytically when the money will be sent to each organization.


LOOK INSIDE EASY LIFE Planner for Moms

Take a sneak peak of EASY LIFE Planner from the images below:



STRUCTURE of EASY LIFE Planner for Moms

  • Yearly Theme
  • Monthly Overview (15 months, runs from January 2015 to March 2016), so you won't miss any important notes, until you change your planner next year
  • Weekly Overview with the entire week on a vertical two-page spread:

        - Personal & Work To-Do Lists
        - Organized Housekeeping Tasks
         - What's Cooking Space to plan your family's daily meals with more than                       60  suggested recipes, based on the healthy Mediterranean diet
         - Appointment Calendar for planning meetings, keep doctors' appointments,               even schedule birthdays and parties
         - Social Media Post Planning, because social sharing is part of our lives
         - Kid designated areas, where you can keep log of vaccines, medicines,                     illnesses, parties and school appointments,
         - Housekeeping Tips & Tricks that will make every woman's "nightmare"                        a bit more enjoyable...

  • Monthly Management and Evaluation Techniques with:

        - Expense records for organizing your financial planning,
        - Stress controlling methods, where you will learn to understand, explain                       and control stress,
         - Self-evaluation techniques, through which you will get to know your                              strengths, weaknesses, faults and virtues

  • Monthly Astrological Analysis of all signs
  • Daily Projection of the "Void of Course" Moon Faces so that you know exactly when to avoid doing, buying and scheduling important things
  • Notebook, with lots of lined pages and areas to take notes of your thoughts and insights
  • Weekly inspiration with quotes to make each week and month extra special



FEATURES of EASY LIFE Planner for Moms

  • Made in Europe in one of the leading European Printing Factories, specialized in printing planners
  • Hand Bound in Soft Faux Leather Cover available in 8 Different Colors – black, red, dark blue, white, pink, fuchsia, beige and blue jeans, all animal and vegan friendly. You are free to choose the color you love more! Just indicate the color you want, when you buy your perk. In case you don't indicate any color, the Planner will be sent in black color.


  • High Quality, 80 grams, Ink-Proof, Acid-Free Paper that allows no ink bleeding
  • Rounded Corners
  • Two Page-Markers so you can easily mark, more than one, pages every time
  • Over 200 pages in total
  • Thread-Bound & Stitched
  • Two available sizes:  size 1:  8.07” x 11” and  size 2:  6.5” x 8.5”
  • Lies Flat, offering a smooth surface for writing every time


THE PRODUCTION of EASY LIFE Planner for Moms

EASY LIFE Planner was created, over the past 18-months, by the joined work and cooperation of several talented people, among which are psychologists, pediatricians, experts on diet and nutrition, talented designers and artists. The target was to create a useful product that will be fun and exciting to use.

Printing colors were chosen carefully, as colors can actually have a psychological and physical impact on us. Light gray and red were chosen as the most suitable ones, for creating a relaxing environment for mothers to keep their notes, and schedules.

I personally, examined many types of papers and binding options and picked those that were more pleasant to write on. I also chose elements, such as an elegant cover in multiple mood-lifting colors and upscale materials that would create a stylish planner.

I have chosen to produce the EASY LIFE Planner on one of the most fantastic printers in Europe, Italy, the Heidelberg Printing Machines. Last summer, I watched the production of a high-quality book and planner on these machines and was astonished by the quality of the printing. I really wish my campaign will be successful, so I can print the EASY LIFE Planner on this machines and provide you with a planner of this high quality.

See below, some images of the machines, that I took during my visit:



SHARE

the EASY LIFE Planner Project

and GET THE PDF for FREE!


EASY LIFE Planner has been a huge game changer for me and for all the moms that have tried it. It will change your mindset, because what starts as a planner ends up as a better life.

By Supporting the EASY LIFE Planner, you will allow yourself and other moms get a fabulous tool to organize motherhood, have daily fun and give their life a total reboot from the inside out!

I am so convinced that EASY LIFE Planner will improve your life that for all of you that cannot donate to the project and get the printed version, we will offer the PDF version completely free. All you have to do is share this campaign on any social media and email us a screenshot or a link with your share to indiegogo@easy-life-planner.com.

Regardless of whether you are able to contribute to this campaign, please allow yourself and other moms to experience how a planner can transform your life from an often frustrating and mind-numbing multitasking to being in total control, relaxed and happy with yourself once again.

Because the marvelous mystery of parenting that we all so often forget is that we don’t have to be a perfect parent in order to be a great parent! Staying happy, good humored and connected with our children and family is all that really matters.

To share this campaign you may use one of the links below:

Share the EASY LIFE Planner for Moms on Facebook!

Share the EASY LIFE Planner for Moms on Twitter!


PLEDGE NOW

if you want to get

the EASY LIFE Planner for Moms


Get the EASY LIFE Planner and start having fun in your daily program!

What truly matters is “Making sure that our children know they are wanted, loved, and loveable – no matter what – and that they will benefit from having us as a role model on how to live a rewarding life”.



GUARANTEE

I have already made all necessary agreements to deliver to you the EASY LIFE Planner. I plan to start the production of EASY LIFE Planner immediately after the successful conclusion of the campaign and even before its conclusion and will do my best in order for the planner to reach you before the end of February.

If my campaign is funded above the amount of USD 30,000 all planners printed will be accompanied by a collectible slipcase that will allow you to keep your planner elegantly on your bookshelf forever and cherish the memories.

In case problems arise, I will do my best to solve them. I promise to be transparent and open during the whole process and inform you about everything.

In case, for any reason, you receive a defective planner, I promise a replacement.

If you have any questions, I will be available to answer them anytime. You can email me at s.kokkidou@easy-life-planner.com  with any questions on motherhood, you may have, regardless of the EASY LIFE Planner Campaign, and I will reply through videos on YOUTUBE's EASY LIFE Planner Channel.

I will try to deliver the EASY LIFE Planner, as soon as possible, and promise to provide you with the best possible quality and result.

In case the campaign does not reach the 10.000 mark, I will not be able to finish the design and production of the planner so I will return all the money back to the backers.

project and get the printed version, we will offer the PDF version completely
free. All you have to do is share this campaign on any social media and email
us a screenshot or a link with your share to 
indiegogo@easy-life-planner.com.
Regardless of whether you are able
to contribute to this campaign, please allow yourself and other moms to
experience how a planner can transform your life from an often frustrating and
mind-numbing multitasking to being in total control, relaxed and happy with
yourself once again. 
Because the marvelous mystery of
parenting that we all so often forget is that we don’t have to be a perfect
parent in order to be a great parent! Staying happy, good humored and connected
with our children and family is all that really matters.
To share this campaign you may use
one of the links below:
Share the EASY LIFE Planner for Moms on Facebook!
Share the EASY LIFE Planner for Moms on Twitter!

PLEDGE NOW
if you want to get

the EASY LIFE Planner for Moms


Get the EASY LIFE Planner and start
having fun in your daily program!What truly matters is “Making sure
that our children know they are wanted, loved, and loveable – no matter what –
and that they will benefit from having us as a role model on how to live a
rewarding life”.

GUARANTEE 
I have already made all necessary agreements to deliver to you the EASY LIFE Planner. I plan to start the production of EASY LIFE Planner immediately after the successful conclusion of the campaign and even before its conclusion and will do my best in order for the planner to reach you before the end of February.

If my campaign is funded above the amount of USD 30,000 all planners printed will be accompanied by a collectible slipcase that will allow you to keep your planner elegantly on your bookshelf forever and cherish the memories.In case problems arise, I will do my best to solve them. I promise to be transparent and open during the whole process and inform you about everything.

In case, for any reason, you receive a defective planner, I promise a replacement.

If you have any questions, I will be available to answer them anytime. You can email me at s.kokkidou@easy-life-planner.com 
with any questions on motherhood, you may have, regardless of the EASY LIFE Planner Campaign, and I will reply through videos on YOUTUBE's EASY LIFE Planner Channel.

I will try to deliver the EASY LIFE Planner, as soon as possible, and promise to provide you with the best possible quality and result. In case the campaign does not reach the 10.000 mark, I will not be able to finish the design and production of the planner so I will return all the money back to the backers.

story:
The Growl64 Story

In January 2014 I was given a gift that would change my life.  It was the GrowlTap®, then known as the Tap It Cap®.  This little device meant I no longer had to finish off a growler in a day or two.  If the growler sat for a week after opening, I would still have fresh, carbonated beer.  Suddenly I realized there were no more excuses for not using a growler all the time. 

So here I am, launching an Indiegogo campaign to establish a 64-tap craft beer tasting room & growler filling station.  We'll have one tap for each ounce in a growler.  My first store on Capitol Hill will source great beers from within 100 miles of Seattle, Washington.  No cans, no bottles, only fresh delicious beer refills.

It took me most of 2014 to come to the conclusion that this vision wasn't going to happen if I continued sitting at home after work writing business plans, doing research and wishing I was selling beer.  I needed to commit, so I stepped away from my project manager role at a local health care organization to start Growl64. 

I have been a craft beer drinker since the 1990’s and bought my first growler from Snoqualmie Brewery back in 2002.  It has been great to see this amazing resurgence in the number of Puget Sound breweries and all of the new local beer.  I know I have missed out on a lot of new beers because when you have a 3-year-old daughter, brewery tours don’t always make the priority list.  Too often I end up with whatever the grocery store has available. 

I have attempted home brewing several times but I’m not very good at it.  But I am good at identifying great beer!  I have a varied background and each of these work experiences will be needed for Growl64 to be successful.  My professional experiences and skill set have come from selling computers & vacuum cleaners, repairing computers, IT support for fortune 500 companies and project management in the health care industry.  Across the board, I have found the most success when I listen and treat all people with respect.  It also helps to drink good beer with them.


What We Need

  • We need fans like you!  We need people who love craft beer!

  • We need people who love the outdoors and the environment! 

  • We need people who want convenient access to local craft beer!


We also need help with:

  • Construction – think floors, walls, ceiling, plumbing, electrical, bathroom, tasting bar
  • Walk In Cooler & Keg Racks – Keeping 64 or more kegs cold requires a lot of cooler space.  In order to keep the space as small as possible, we will be using keg racks to stack the kegs – 2 deep by 2 tall.
  • Keg Couplings, Gas Regulators, Tubes, & Taps – We have to connect 64 kegs to 64 taps and keep different styles under different pressure.  We are keeping costs down by avoiding the Glycol coolant system, since the taps will be mounted directly on the cooler.
  • Bar & Tables – I want you to hang out and have samples from our 64 taps as you make a decision on which craft beer to take home with you.


What You Get

Everything from Beer For A Year to a pint glass Brewzy, there are lots of exciting perks being offered in our campaign.

Beer For A Year – It’s a $1,000 contribution and a great value

  • 1 fill a week for a year from any of the 64 taps
  • 1 GrowlTap® to keep your beer fresher for longer
  • 2 Growl64 branded growlers
  • 1 Growl64 branded cooler bag that fits both of your growlers & a pint glass Brewzy®

$1,000 too steep?  Check out all the other perks listed on the right. 

The Impact

As a contributor, your value comes from knowing you are supporting the local economy.  Local breweries employ thousands of local people and the number of breweries keeps growing.  Beer discovery will be easier for consumers since 64 local options will always be on tap at our location.  Washington breweries will be able to expand their customer base, increasing their chances of long term success.

There is also an impact on the long term success of our environment.  According to a 2011 study by PricewaterhouseCoopers, refillable glass containers can be used over 50 times.  “In general, multiple reuse (refilling) reduces resource consumption and produces less environmentally harmful greenhouse gas when compared to one-way containers” (PricewaterhouseCoopers AG WPG, “Reuse and Recycling Systems for Selected Beverage Packaging from a Sustainability Perspective” , June, 2011)

Additional value comes in knowing that you and others who are like-minded are ready to join the more sustainable beer culture.  Here are a few reuse benefits compared to recycling:

  • Reuse keeps goods and materials out of the waste stream and is more efficient than recycling.  Did you know that the average aluminum can contains only 40 percent post-consumer recycled aluminum? (Aluminum Recycling Facts, United States Environmental Protection Agency)
  • Reuse reduces the strain on valuable resources, such as fuel, forests and water supplies, and helps safeguard wildlife habitat.


Risks & Challenges

Culture change is risky.  Asking each of you and millions of others to change your beer purchasing behavior is risky.  I believe it is an achievable goal.  One reason is due to the incredible interest in craft beer.  The interest is due to breweries opening up in communities, big and small.  Similar to farm-to-table, craft brewing encompasses "buy local" at its core.  By becoming part of their communities, breweries should experience longevity, similar to small European community breweries.

Another reason is that growlers are also becoming more popular.  Nearly all breweries offer their beer in growlers for customers to take home, the most popular being the 64oz growler.  3 years ago, few people knew what a growler was when I would talk about craft beer.  Today, it has flipped.  I'm more surprised when someone doesn't know.

Growl64 will capitalize on this increased interest by providing only local craft beer in reusable growlers.  No bottles or cans.  Only breweries from within 100 miles of the store.


Other Ways You Can Help

For every growler filled, it keeps five 12oz cans or bottles from being recycled.  Start your journey to being a more sustainable beer consumer today!  Other ways you can help:

  • Spread the word.  Ask 5 of your friends to contribute.
  • Become a fan of our Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/growl64
  • Follow us on twitter @the_growlist
  • Share your enthusiasm!  Share our vision!
  • Join the Growl64 team.  Send us a message on Facebook!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Ana and I am a Registered Nurse and a Holistic Health Coach. I currently work for the Office of the Public Guardian in the Department of Human Services serving the elderly population in Hudson and Bergen county. On the side I coach people for better wellness through a holistic approach. I create different programs based on the clients physical needs, they go through a comprehensive health analysis and are coached through their entire program.  Because its a Holistic approach, a plant based diet with herbs, supplements and other alternative methods such as detox, bio mat therapy, lymphatic massage, therapeutic grade essential oils, colon hydrotherapy, IV Vitamin and Chelation therapy, Infra red sauna, acupuncture, hyperbaric chamber and Live Blood analysis will be used to reach maximum health. Your contributions will help us to get our clinic going with the above services for a healthier community and a healthier America!!  Please donate today.

What We Need & What You Get

All the funding will go for the services used in clinic, that includes all equipment, initial rent payments and employees pay, until the clinic can get up on its own feet. For contributors I have offered to give them free consultation, their names or business will be posted on the opening banner of the clinic, personalized thank you notes and a free 3 day juice guide to detox.  

The Impact

By opening this clinic I know we will have a healthier community and a healthier America.  I will be working with schools to implement a healthier lunch program for kids, I will be working with families so that each member of that family can be healthy.  I will be working with different churches and their congregations offering  workshops and other tools to lead them to better health.  The clinic will absolutely offer health analysis and detoxification programs to each client that comes into the journey of holistic health and healing.  This clinic will be a One Stop Shop for wellness.  I am sure that the community will benefit in mind, body and spirit, which in turn creates a healthy America, leading healthy life styles which contribute to a proactive and productive work environment.

Risks & Challenges

As a new business owner, I guess it is always difficult to get up firm on your feet, when you lack funding.  The amount of contribution may seem a lot, but it will help the clinic get up on its own feet within a few months.  Of course like any other business we run the risk of not having enough people due treatments or consults, we run into high taxes and rent fees, the challenge like any other small business is the fear of closing down due to insufficiency of funds.

At the same time I am confident in my work and in who I am, and the services i provide.  With a good team of professionals and marketing tools, I dont see how this business will collapse, plus the Wellness Industry is growing, it is now a $3.4 Trillion global industry, three times bigger than the worldwide pharmaceutical industry!! I am optimistic that the clinic will have success.

Reference:  http://blog.globalspaandwellnesssummit.org/2014/10/wellness-is-now-a-3-4-trillion-global-industry-three-times-bigger-than-the-worldwide-pharmaceutical-industry/


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help me financially, I ask you to at least share my campaign with your friends.  Use you facebook, twitter, instagram account and let them know.  Leave a little comment in the comment section if you believe in wellness of mind, body and spirit, do tell a little blerb if you ever used any holistic alternative services and how they have helped you.   Use all indiegogo share tools used here on this website.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
"We are developing this Vehicle Tracking Platform, and offering it free of charge to anyone in the world, so a small helping hand to help us finish it off would be greatly appreciated".

Other tracking products have a monthly fee, usually around AU$20.00 per month. Using FreeVehicleTracking.com will save you hundreds of dollars per year.

WHAT DOES IT DO?


WHY ARE WE DEVELOPING THIS?

Did you know there are over 1.1 BILLION vehicles on our planet?

In 2012, there were an estimated 721,000 motor vehicle thefts in the US alone, estimating over $4 billion in property losses, 79,000 thefts in the United Kingdom and 58,000 thefts in Australia.

This is a global problem, and now we have a global solution.

Providing a free global GPS vehicle tracking service to everyone who uses a vehicle is the driving force behind FreeVehicleTracking.com – a new product being developed by Australian based company GPSengine.

This no cost, no contract Vehicle Tracking Platform provides users with real time vehicle tracking and a 7-day history report for up to 5 vehicles on one account.

Use Free Vehicle Tracking to:

  • Assist in the recovery of stolen vehicles
  • Monitor the activities of a learner driver
  • Know where your family members are in an emergency
  • Have peace of mind that your precious cargo is safe

For anyone who has been considering GPS vehicle tracking but hasn’t wanted to pay a monthly fee, or sign up to a contractual commitment, this gives them the opportunity to give it a go, for free (for personal use).

There are no restrictions on usage, and no limited time frames apply to the service being free. We simply want to see as many vehicle users take advantage of this revolutionary product as possible.

We (GPSengine) have been in business developing commercial vehicle tracking platforms for 10 years and quite simply, we want to offer consumers global access to vehicle tracking free of charge.  We have realised that with a relatively small amount of additional development we can use a considerable amount of our current design to provide this consumer vehicle tracking platform.

To Do List

We are currently designing and building our 5th generation commercial platform and seek to raise funds for the additional development to complete the stage one features (see below) for the consumer platform. Existing technology we need to modify to successfully launch Free Vehicle Tracking:

  • Alter the database structure to suit large scalability
  • Develop a more suitable report and history display
  • Integration with a more suitable map provider

Stage One Free Vehicle Tracking Features:

  • Modern, simple to use UI
  • Real-time tracking
  • 7 days Vehicle History
  • Detailed Activity Report
  • Up to 5 devices per account
  • Multiple Hardware options. We do not manufacture hardware, available hardware types will be published and updated on our website.
  • Global Mapping



Stage Two Features:

  • iPhone and Android App with additional (paid) features, this will include push alerts for vehicle moving, alarm activation, vehicle starter disable.

With developers ready and available to work on this project, additional funding will enable substantial progression and ultimately the release of Free Vehicle Tracking around the globe.

GPSengine currently supports around 10,000 trans-Tasman vehicles ranging from cars and trucks to boats and tractors.  We are dedicated to providing consumers with quality and affordable GPS tacking systems and have the knowledge and proven ability.  GPSengine provides tracking services to thousands of satisfied customers throughout New Zealand and Australia.

How do I get Free Vehicle Tracking?


FAQs

Q   What is Free Vehicle Tracking?

A   Basically, it's a web service that GPS tracking devices talk to, updating their location in real time. As a user, you log in and see your device that's installed in your vehicle. You can view it traveling in real time, run reports and view the vehicles' activity on the map.

Q   How long will it be free?

A   Forever. However we will introduce some features with a small charge in the future.

Q   What else will I need (i.e. supported devices)?

A   You will need a tracking device. Please see our list of supported devices. You will also need a data SIM from a Telco, or mobile data provider. Information on the best options for SIM cards will also be on our website.

Q   How do I get ongoing help using this product?

A   We are putting together a user forum, for community support. This will be made available prior to the official launch of FreevehicleTracking.com.

Q   I am a hardware manufacturer, will my device work on this platform?

A    Please contact us, and be prepared to share some basic information on your hardware and communication protocols. We test new hardware very thoroughly before approving it on our platforms.

story:
‘Low cost for consumers, high price for those at sea... ’

-The Guardian.

Ever ate tuna, shrimps, prawns, fruits de mer...what have you?

Ever bought that value-for-money seafood or ready-meal from Walmart, Tesco, Carrefour, Costco, Morrisons, the Co-operative and Iceland?

Now...ever heard of men named Myint Naing, Win Win Ko, Kyaw Naing, Myint Thein, Kyaw Yelin? And...the list goes on...

What's the catch? It's the hidden cost of that value-for-money bargain. The lives lost at sea under slavery for the catch. (Click on the names to read more about the stories.)

Long story short, these guys are from Myanmar (Burma). Myanmar is not a rich nor a first world country. And these men are explicitly poor, more than you can ever imagine. The low price you paid for your value meal could be higher than their one month salary or maybe years of salary for some. Why? Simply because they were just slaves in the sea.

Here's the story:

They have/had friends, families, home just like you, though in a worse off conditions. But they left them in search for jobs to to make a better living, risking their lives. But what they discovered after taking the risks was far worse than what they had imagined, where the only better way was to die or to let die. Conned by human traffickers/brokers, beaten and tortured by Thai skippers, they became slaves in fishing boats in the Thai fishing industry where majority of the seafood is exported out to America and Europe. More to how it works: The Guardian's Report




Source: The Guardian Research from: http://www.theguardian.com/global-development/2014/jun/10/-sp-migrant-workers-new-life-enslaved-thai-fishing

The investigations and research has been going on for few years now. But sad truth is that only starting from early this year 2015 were these slave fishermen rescued and returned home. The latest tragical story was about Myint Naing, who only returned home after 22 years, beating the story '12 Years a Slave'.

Why are we telling you this?

The IOM (International Organisation for Migrations) and the governments are working together in further investigations and bringing back these victims. Here's the latest so far: Trafficked Myanmar Fishermen Return Home from Indonesia

But as quoted by Associated Press:
"...significant challenges remain, including the cost of feeding them, providing medical care and getting them home."

"Much more is needed, especially since many of the fishermen were paid little or nothing and are going home penniless. Some have not been in contact with family for years and aren't sure if relatives have moved or even if they will find them alive."

More help is needed. And we can't do it alone.

There are support in trying to bring them back. But what's after that?

They risked their lives, earned nearly nothing for many years, fortunately escaping living hell, and now they're back home but at zero again...

They were possibly the source of where our food on the table came from. They lived in torture, fearing death and earning little or nothing. (Let alone those who had actually died in from doing so.)

Consumers are not the ones to be blamed for buying food that was made available. But your support in giving a helping hand to these men will make much difference.

"If Americans and Europeans are eating this fish, they should remember us," said Hlaing Min, 30, a runaway slave from Benjina.

"There must be a mountain of bones under the sea. ... The bones of the people could be an island, it's that many." _Associated Press http://bigstory.ap.org/article/b9e0fc7155014ba78e07f1a022d90389/ap-investigation-are-slaves-catching-fish-you-buy

They spent years working hard in slavery in the sea, yet nothing came out of it but their torturous memory that will hunt them for the rest of their lives.  Help them get back on their feet. Help them live a dignified life, whatever that's left of it. We can repay them through small act of kindness and gratitude.

Restoring Hopes in Humanity

Photo Credit: IOM 2015

Not just a donation campaign to help the needy. This is also to show the world that regardless of the greed act of suppliers and corporations, we as consumers, as citizens of the world are not ignorant of the chain of the food that is brought to us. 

This is to show that we are aware and we care.

Projects like Issra helped uncover the human trafficking and save these souls. And this campaign will take a step further to help those that were saved.

With Myanmar in political transition and just few years after the country opening up to the world, the country is in needs of support in many areas. Though the government and corporations try to help bring the workers back, there's little to what can be done to help them carry on with their lives. We can help restore their faith in life again.

How we intend to do it?

1. We will raise funds to help those rescued Myanmar migrant workers, to help them settle back at their home and find ways to adapt in the society again. The International Organization for Migration (IOM) office in Myanmar will help us with the funds distribution: providing name lists, backgrounds, authentication, etc.

 2. Through this campaign, we hope to raise awareness among the international community and stop further trafficking in the fishing industry. There are victims from other countries like Cambodia as well. Part of the funds will go to helping the rest of the slaves return to their homes.

3. We hope to continue the campaign by getting help from IOM (Myanmar) and seeking more members to join us in our efforts.

What, how and why:

Due to his significant story of being tragically away from his family for 22 years, as a first step in the campaign, the focus will be on Myint Naing.

   














What other ways can you help?

Please help raise awareness. The most important and urgent thing is to bring back home those under slavery and help them reintegrate back into society.

Help raise awareness that consumers are aware of these cases and truly condemn such act of greed and lack of humanity. 

Help raise awareness to put an end to this modern day slavery and human trafficking once and for all.

Our Promise to you:

1. All the funds raised will go directly to the beneficiaries. If you can help us reach the goal, we will contribute our on travel expense, time and effort to personally ensure the funds reach the beneficiaries. And yes we will make sure the perks claimed are deliver as promised.

2. We will travel to Myint Naing’s hometown to personally give him the fund that we all have contributed. The process will be videoed and documented for everyone to witness.

3. Working closely with IOM office in Myanmar, top priority will be given to those who had survived more than 5 years in slavery.

Who we are

Started out as a one person initiative, we now have new members joining us in our efforts. We are a group of Myanmar nationals currently living in Singapore, who wants to help in fulfilling the gaps in helping these victims of human trafficking reintegrate back into their family and society.

We are in touch with IOM Myanmar for research and to understand thoroughly the current efforts on the issues. IOM has kindly offered to help us in the initiative and we hope more will support us and join us in our efforts.


Questions?
Any questions you may have or any clarifications you need, please feel free to contact us. We are open to answer any questions regarding the campaign. Thank you in advance for your contribution.

Lastly. these men need help; both physically and mentally. They have survived living hell and we're sure with proper support we will be able to bring them back on their feet again, from the nightmare they had faced. So that next time they see fish on their dinner table, they can enjoy it without tears running down their face.
story_txt:

story:
Ayez de la Suisse dans les idées...

Bonjour, je suis d'origine suisse et j'ai lancé en 2012 l'entreprise S.O.S. Fondue au Québec. Forts du succès rencontré par nos authentiques recettes de fondue au fromage, mon équipe et moi-même rêvons désormais de posséder un food truck à nos couleurs dans les rues de Montréal et à travers le Québec.

Nous avons envie de proposer en tous temps nos fameux "hot-fondue" comme nous le faisons déjà dans de nombreux festivals. Nous aimerions les offrir dans au moins cinq saveurs différentes. Nous avons aussi envie de proposer d'autres plats typiques de la Suisse, comme les fameux "röstis" faits de pommes de terre, lard et fromage. 

Nous possédons déjà le camion (voir ci-dessous) qui est prêt à être transformé en cuisine mobile comme on en voit beaucoup dans les rues de nombreuses villes américaines. Le financement demandé servira à transformer le camion en cuisine et aussi de le décorer aux couleurs de la Suisse. 

Ci-dessous , un exemple de décoration que nous pourrions envisager. A noter que nous mettons au concours cette décoration...

Notre envie de posséder un camion de rue est très forte car elle répond à une demande de nos clients et amis. En effet, Montréal abrite déjà un bon nombre de Food truck proposant de nombreuses saveurs mais il n'existe pas de camion qui propose de tel mets. La fondue est tellement populaire au Québec et le succès de nos "hot-fondue" est si important qu'il nous semble naturel de pouvoir hausser d'un cran nos ambitions en possédant un camion... qui ne demande qu'à voir le jour grâce à vous!

Nous avons déjà acheté le camion idéal pour notre projet. Il s'agit d'un Ford Grumman 1999 qui appartenait à FedEx. C'est un modèle très populaire parmi les food truck existants. Notre investissement total se monte à plus de 10'000$, frais d'immatriculation et d'expertise compris. 

Nous avons désormais besoin de 40'000$ pour terminer et lancer notre projet. Ce montant comprend les travaux d'aménagement intérieur, le mobilier de cuisine, la décoration extérieure et la main d'oeuvre. Nous nous engageons à respecter ce budget et à régulièrement vous informer de l'avancée des travaux. 

A noter que si le montant n'est pas atteint, il servira tout de même à faire avancer le projet et pousser un gros investisseur ou un établissement bancaire à encourager le projet. Les privilèges auxquels vous avez droit grâce à votre apport sont assurés, car même si le camion ne démarre pas cette année, la compagnie reste en activité...

Mon équipe se joint à moi pour vous remercier de votre intérêt pour notre projet. Si vous ne participez pas directement, nous vous remercions de le faire connaître auprès de vos amis. 

Nous espérons avoir réussi à vous mettre un peu de Suisse dans les idées... :)

story:
The Temple of Growth Advancement (TOGA) is a local interfaith temple serving Reno and Northern Nevada since 2006. The temple supports all religious and spiritual paths, provides classes, personal counseling, and most importantly supports personal growth and healing. Our temple leaders, Misty Reiknights and Scott Reimers, are dedicated to helping you understand and explore your own spiritual path, your own ancestry, and help you find tools to make your life richer and happier.

We are working to become a recognized non-profit religious organization so that we can expand our efforts to support our members and our community through outreach and education programs.

My name is Stephanie and I have been attending the temple for almost six years. I would like to tell you about what our temple has done to help the members and the outlying community, and share our vision for what we would like to build. I met Misty when we were both working for a company that takes care of the mentally handicapped.

She invited me into her home for a ritual. At that time, these rituals were held in her and her husband Scott’s home, a double wide that was always filled with people every Thursday. Though some people brought snacks and side dishes, Misty made the majority of the meals for the people who gathered in her home. There was never a lack for warmth or welcome in her home, it was always flowing freely.

In 2013, Scott and Misty opened a new temple to serve their growing community and a store to supply magical and spiritual tools to the community at large. The shop and temple are currently located at 1004 and 1006 Wells Avenue. Since the store and temple opened their doors, Misty and Scott have worked tirelessly and selflessly to support the personal growth and healing of any person who walks through the door - all without judgement, preaching, or attempts at conversion. Because that's not what TOGA is about. It's not about converting you to our path, it's about helping you define and understand your path, be it Wiccan, Christian, Jewish, Pagan, or undefined.

I would not be the woman I am today without Misty and Scott’s help. At the time I met them I was in a not so healthy relationship that was affecting my mental health. I didn’t realize that I was continuing a pattern that I had learned in childhood. Misty helped me to see that and then she helped give me the tools to become the strong, confident and compassionate woman that I am today. They provided the tools to help me and many others get their lives together and headed on our own individual paths.

None of this would be possible without the sacrifices and selfless service provided by Misty and Scott. They give of themselves constantly, their time, their home, their food, their generosity, etc. Misty is an ordained reverend and a counselor with over 30 years of experience. She offers counseling all week long. She typically charges only $20 per hour, a fraction of what a therapist would. She will work with you for as long as you work with her, and she has never turned anyone away because they were not able to pay. Scott is an experienced priest and author, and he teaches classes throughout the week. Like Misty, he often works for free. Both of them dream of expanding their efforts and serving the community through education programs for youth and adults, outreach and support programs for the homeless, and pagan spiritual services, but they can't do it with only their own resources. By supporting the Temple, you not only support the health of spiritual people in the community, you also support a very special family, who have sacrificed for years to serve others. We hope you will consider making a donation to help TOGA become a non-profit, and gain recognition for doing the work it has done for many years.

Also, we have a fundraiser coming up in October, and please come by and visit us and see what we're all about!
