story:
WHO WE ARE

Growing up we’ve always been about family and we used coupons to save money.  I can remember my mother making it a fun game for me as a very young child to help her cut coupons before we would go to the store.  What if there was a way to easily access the deals you wanted and have all of them at your fingertips?  So we came up with an idea.  We sought out to make a platform with great deals that was also a way to connect with family, friends, co-workers and businesses to strengthen our local community.  We agreed that if we were going to do anything that it had to be a something that supported family and gave back to the community. 



And so, my parents Lesa and Lew who were living in the U.S Virgin Islands and I (Ted) who was returning from extended time overseas as an expat, decided to be closer together.  We quit our careers, moved to Los Angeles, and started our family business - RaptorCow.  Easier said than done!  After months of getting it set up and some definite trial and error we have finally started to gain some traction.


(RaptorCow?!?!  What a weird name!  Yeah we know, check out the storybehind the name HERE)


So What Exactly Is RaptorCow?

RaptorCow is a family-owned marketing and advertising company.  We focus on helping local and family businesses, start-ups, and new companies grow and engage in the community. We are promoting this community interaction between businesses and consumers with creation of our deals and coupon platform www.raptorcowSFV.com.   We truly understand our customers because we are a family business ourselves!



HOW RAPTORCOW WORKS


For Businesses we offer low cost marketing and help drive consumers to your doors!

What our new  RaptorCow marketing platform can do for businesses:

  • Beautifully Constructed Business Profiles

  • Deals – Email Direct to Mobile and Text Deals (Text Deals Coming Soon)

  • Your deals are your deals!  We don't take commission or dictate your prices like the other guys, and we encourage creativity!  Do something unique or change them as often as you like!

  • Featured Businesses and Deals (Have your business/deal featured at the top!)

  • Build Subscriber Lists

  • Direct Email and Text Marketing (Text Marketing Coming Soon!)

  • Deals App Via Support – Facebook Integration (Coming Soon!)

  • Business Consulting and Expert Customer Service

  • Business to Business Facilitation


CHECK OUT THE DISCOUNT RATES FOR CONTRIBUTING TO OUR CAMPAIGN!



        Business owners,  you can take advantage of these limited time introductory rates by clicking on the perks to the right.


        Consumers  can use RaptorCow to find awesome deals for the businesses you actually go to.  The best part is, RaptorCow is free (and remember we want to keep it that way)!

        What you can do with RaptorCow as a Consumer at www.raptorcowSFV.com

        • Search deals and services for your favorite businesses

        • Support local businesses and build the community in your area

        • Interact with businesses by subscribing to RaptorCow or to the business

        • Receive updates on deals sent straight to your phone

        • Provide us with suggestions on your favorite businesses and deals you want to see on our site

          And most importantly…

        • You can help others in need with RaptorCow’s Philanthropic Mission

        So how do you RaptorCow?  It can be done in 3 easy steps. (Tutorial Video – doesn’t my mom have a lovely voice haha!)

        1. Go to www.raptorcowSFV.com
        2. Search for a great local deal and select it
        3. Click send me deal and enter your email




        Philanthropic Mission

        RaptorCow proudly supports and sponsors organizations that help build our community and its families.  As deals are redeemed on www.raptorcowSFV.com, RaptorCow donates to a program in one of three areas: Community, Education, and Family.  We believe that one person can make a difference and everyone who uses our services is doing their part.  We are Registered in the State of California to donate and provide portions of proceeds from our services to the programs we support.  (See our full Philanthropic Message here) 



        Supporting Local Businesses and Building the Community through Charities and....Sunglasses?

        When you use RaptorCow, don’t forget to use your RaptorCow Sunglasses, aka RC Shades (#RCShades).  What are RC Shades you ask?  Simply put, they’re sunglasses with a message behind them.  They’re your statement and symbol saying you support local businesses in your area.  I’m sure you’re asking the question,

        “RaptorCow is supporting local businesses and building the community through deals, charities and....Sunglasses? Wait…What?!  SUNGLASSES?!” 

        That’s’ right!  When you wear and/or buy a pair, you’re helping us with our Philanthropic Mission to strengthen our community - AND they are the coolest way to save money!

        There are a variety of colors and styles, all designed with the RaptorCow logo on the side. You can get a pair from a promotional event we are at, enter one of our contests, or purchase a pair from our website. 

        Oh yeah or donate here on Indiegogo! (View our perks)

        When you use RaptorCow, grab those RC Shades, take a picture and:

        Share it, tag it, selfie it, tweet it, film it, post it, shout it, like it, trend it, blog it!  Whatever you want!  Be unique, because we want to see it!  Help spread RaptorCow!

          There will be prizes for the most fun and creative entries to our “Show us how YOU RaptorCow” contests so stay tuned!




        MONEY

        You can see what RaptorCow has become in a short time with just the three of us, but we realized with our high goals and how fast we want to grow that we need help.  A support staff and funding to manage all of this would be a great start!

        So why do we need your money? $5,000 to be exact ;-)

        With this, we can do  a lot!  So what do we need?  Here’s a breakdown:



          Reaching our funding goal of $5,000 would keep us on track for 2015, and allow us to implement our plan on schedule. YEAH BABY! 

        The more we exceed this goal the more likely we can continue to  operate  unhindered for the rest of the year, add more features and expand to other areas at a much fast rate - WOOHOO! 


        We've been interviewed on:

        The Crowdfuning Cast Podcast (Episdoe 113)

        http://crowdfundingcast.tk/crowdfunding-cast-episode-113-raptorcow/

        We have been featured in publications such as:

        The Miami Herald

        http://markets.financialcontent.com/mi.miamiherald/news/read/29288260/

        The Boston Globe

        http://finance.boston.com/boston/news/read/29288260

        The San Francisco Chronicle

        http://finance.sfgate.com/hearst.sfgate/news/read/29288260/

        Travel Weekly

        http://finance.travelweekly.com/northstar.travelweekly/news/read/29288260/


        How You Can Help Us:

        • Contribute – We want you to be a part of this and we appreciate your help!

        • Spread RaptorCow  – Tell your friends and engage with us on social media, email or give us a call

        • Use the deals and support local businesses

        • Buy / Talk about / Wear RC Shades™

        • Subscribe to our deals website and your favorite business

        • Give us suggestions on the places you want to see on the site

        • Send us referrals if you or somebody know could use RaptorCow’s services for their business

        WHEN DOES IT START?

        Well it actually started 8 months ago after we sat down together as a family (via Skype, you know the whole far away from each other thing).  We decided that we wanted to pursue a business opportunity together and agreed that it had to be something in which we could give back.  We’ve been at it ever since and our official  launch coincides with this crowdfunding campaign January 31s – April 1, 2015.  We still have a lot of work to do so please keep the faith; becasue we are and we believe in this 100%! 

        FINAL THOUGHTS AND THE FUTURE

        We hope that you understand our vision and business model that we’ve constructed.  In a year, we would like to be established firmly in the San Fernando Valley, expanded to the rest of Los Angeles, Hollywood, and Westside Cities region and starting service in San Diego County.  Finishing the creation of our RaptorCow App is also one of our main goals. We want to have deals and discounts for all categories of business and a service that people can easily use. 

        If you have any questions, suggestions, comments or just want to say “Hi” please feel free to call or email us at any time.  When we say “US” we mean the Founders - Ted, Lesa and Lew.  We will ensure that we personally answer your questions and we appreciate all of your support.

        Thank you!

        Ted, Lesa and Lew
        The RaptorCow Team

        “RaptorCow!  That’s a good deal.”

  There will be prizes
for the most fun and creative entries to our “Show us how YOU RaptorCow”
contests so stay tuned! 
MONEY
You can see what RaptorCow has become in a short time with
just the three of us, but we realized with our high goals and how fast we want
to grow that we need help.  A support
staff and funding to manage all of this would be a great start!
So why do we need your money? $5,000 to be exact ;-)
With this, we can do  a lot!  So what do we need?  Here’s a breakdown:  Reaching our funding goal of $5,000 would
keep us on track for 2015, and allow us to implement our plan on schedule. YEAH BABY! 
The more we exceed this goal the more likely we can continue to  operate  unhindered for the rest of the year, add more features and expand to other areas at a much fast
rate - WOOHOO!  

We've been interviewed on:The Crowdfuning Cast Podcast (Episdoe 113)http://crowdfundingcast.tk/crowdfunding-cast-episode-113-raptorcow/We have been featured in publications such as:
The Miami Herald
http://markets.financialcontent.com/mi.miamiherald/news/read/29288260/
The Boston Globe
http://finance.boston.com/boston/news/read/29288260
The San Francisco Chronicle
http://finance.sfgate.com/hearst.sfgate/news/read/29288260/
Travel Weekly
http://finance.travelweekly.com/northstar.travelweekly/news/read/29288260/
How You Can Help Us:

Contribute – We want you to be a part of this and we
appreciate your help!
Spread RaptorCow 
– Tell your friends and engage with us on social media, email or give us
a call
Use the deals and support local businesses
Buy / Talk about / Wear RC Shades™ 
Subscribe to our deals website and your favorite business
Give us suggestions
on the places you want to see on the site
Send us referrals if you or somebody know could
use RaptorCow’s services for their business

WHEN DOES IT START?
Well it actually started 8 months ago after we sat down
together as a family (via Skype, you know the whole far away from each other
thing).  We decided that we wanted to
pursue a business opportunity together and agreed that it had to be something
in which we could give back.  We’ve been
at it ever since and our official  launch coincides with this crowdfunding campaign
January 31s – April 1,
2015.  We still have a lot of work to do
so please keep the faith; becasue we are and we believe in this 100%!  
FINAL THOUGHTS AND THE FUTURE
We hope that you understand our vision and business model
that we’ve constructed.  In a year, we
would like to be established firmly in the San Fernando Valley, expanded to the
rest of Los Angeles, Hollywood, and Westside Cities region and starting service
in San Diego County.  Finishing the creation
of our RaptorCow App is also one of our main goals. We want to have deals and
discounts for all categories of business and a service that people can easily
use.  
If you have any questions, suggestions, comments or just
want to say “Hi” please feel free to call or email us at any time.  When we say “US” we mean the Founders - Ted,
Lesa and Lew.  We will ensure that we
personally answer your questions and we appreciate all of your support.
Thank you!Ted, Lesa and LewThe RaptorCow Team
“RaptorCow!  That’s
a good deal.”

story:
Your support will help Skiku create these experiences for students in the communities we visit...



Skiku’s goal is to get Alaska skiing. In 2012 the program started in the NANA region and we named it NANANordic. In 2014 we expanded across Alaska and we call the statewide program Skiku. In 2015 we work with 40 communities from Bethel to Barrow! We work in statewide partnerships with school districts, corporate and community organizations, and volunteer coaches from the broader ski community to foster the health, recreation, and competitive sports benefits of cross-country skiing and biathlon.

The culture, tradition and landscape of Alaska are conducive to a thriving Nordic ski program, and Skiku is the only Nordic ski program equipped to build a sustainable infrastructure statewide.

We are launching this IndieGoGo campaign because we are looking for supporters who will help this program continue to grow. 

Will you join us in achieving the goal of seeing all of Alaska on skis?




In 2014 we visited 27 communities across Alaska and taught 3,000 students to ski. 

Every year we explore more communities. 


Your support will help us bring skiing to every corner of Alaska. All the skis are donated to the local schools and we continue to build sustainable ski programs all across Alaska.

A portion of our fundraising dollars will be used to produce a video that gives all of our supporters an opportunity to share in the joy of sharing skiing with Alaska. 

Video shooters will travel to different locations to capture the moments that remind us of why we love tackling the challenges of taking our program to some of Alaska's remotest villages. 


This moment was captured in Shishmaref in April of 2014.



One set of Ski Equipment for one student: $200 (700 sets will be delivered in 2015)

Hats for Students: $20 per hat

One plane ticket to a village for a volunteer: $850 (on average) 

In Village Coach for six weeks: $2500

story:
Project Description


We are Through A Lens Darkly LLC, independent documentary filmmakers who, for over 25 years, have focused on creating unique audio-visual experiences that inform, educate and entertain, while illuminating the human condition in the search for identity, family and spirituality.

TALD producers Thomas Allen Harris & Deborah Willis with Ford Foundation President Darren Walker

We have successfully launched an epic new award-winning documentary film, THROUGH A LENS DARKLY: BLACK PHOTOGRAPHERS AND THE EMERGENCE OF A PEOPLE, which has played to sold-out audiences at festivals and in theaters in over 60 cities around the world, from New York to Melbourne, Los Angeles to Cairo, Chicago to Krakow, Atlanta to Rio de Janerio and everywhere in between, and will be nationally broadcast on PBS' Independent Lens on February 16th. Through A Lens Darkly, inspired by the ground-breaking work of photo-historian Deborah Willis, PhD., is about contemporary artists probing the recesses of the American dream by interrogating images of stories suppressed, forgotten and lost. It is the first documentary to explore the role of photography in shaping the identity, aspirations and social emergence of African Americans from slavery to the present.

Our companion transmedia project, DIGITAL DIASPORA FAMILY REUNION: 1WORLD1FAMILY, launched in 2009, is specifically designed to get audiences to personally engage with the subject matter of the film by bringing their own family photographs to a live public event, where their images are shared with others in the creation of a new form of community, where strangers are transformed into “family.” We have held over 23 DDFR engagements across the country, interviewing over 900 participants, gathering over 1000 hours of video footage, collecting over 10,000 images and receiving over 80,000 "Likes" and over 12.2 million media impressions, which have resulted in an additional 2,000 images being gathered from people eager to share their stories via Instagram, Twitter and Facebook.

Thomas Allen Harris and TALD Team @ Dartmouth College

Everywhere we have traveled, people have asked us how they, too, can use our film and transmedia platform in their schools, places of work, organizations and neighborhoods to spark cross-cultural and inter-generational dialogues on issues of race, visual representation, self-identity, self-determination and how we "see" one another, especially ideas around "The Other." This campaign will help us to create "Train-the-Trainer" materials and guides so that we can enlarge the reach of the film and DDFR.  Specifically, we are looking to create:

  • Educational Teaching Guides for High Schools Educators
  • Diversity & Inclusion Templates for Businesses & Institutions
  • Community Tool-kits for Local Organizations

The funds raised will be used for scholars, academic consultants, writers, multilingual translators, multimedia producers, videographers and editors to help us develop innovative tools that will enable the issues, ideas, messages and values prominent in the film and throughout the DDFR transmedia project to be successfully duplicated anywhere and everywhere.

We are at a socio-cultural and political moment where our understanding of people who are different from us is of vital importance to our own ability to understand ourselves. We see daily reminders of the dangers of marginalization and lack of representation in the images that define a society.

People Killed In Police Custody 1999 - 2014   Source: NAACP LDF, Inc. & Gawker

Through A Lens Darkly and Digital Diaspora Family Reunion offer Hope and a way forward that leads to greater social harmony and improved relations between people, founded on our shared values and experiences as Human Beings. This campaign will help us to spread that Hope far and wide.

Through A Lens Darkly Screening, Cardinal Ritter High School, St. Louis, 2014

What We Need

We are looking to raise $150,000 to cover production costs associated with the creation of the 1World1Family Tool-Kit. We already have a substantial amount of content "in the can," which needs to be reviewed, transcribed and turned into short video pieces. We need to create specific teaching and discussion guides for each short piece and the guides need to be translated into Spanish. We need to create step-by-step instructional materials for how to run a DDFR event, including associated film screenings, community photo-sharing sessions and community discussions on visual literacy. We need to develop best practices and business cases for Diversity & Inclusion training and facilitation guides. We need to create specific educational classroom guides and student activities using our existing content and conforming to Common Core protocols.

We are routing contributions to the campaign through our fiscal sponsor, National Black Programming Consortium, which has been a very strong supporter and funder of our project. All contributions over $150 will be tax-deductible (less the value of the premium received.)

The Impact

PROJECT IMPACT – TALD: Post-VIP Screening, Aug 12, 2014

“The film is very important to anyone who is seeking liberation from self-doubt, and looking to reconnect to the greatness and power of family and community. This was a serious undertaking by committed artist who have a love for human family..........kudos TEAM DDFR/TALD”    - Kev via Facebook

“Thank you so much for this wonderful and necessary piece of work! I left the theater proud, reaffirmed, uplifted and education. There are so many artists in this project that I have studied and purchased their books. It also affirmed the decisions and sacrifices I have made over the past 4 years to switch careers and pursue fine art photography.”     - Kimberly via Facebook

"I cannot speak enough about your movie. After the screening, my head was about to explode because of the many images that were running through my brain.  I could not go home.  Instead, I went to a Harlem bar with my friend … to have a debrief ....There, we sat and talked about the many stories and emotions packed in your movie:  abandonment, life without a father, African-American history, self-esteem, family, freedom, slavery, family secrets, passing, the value that people of color place on each other (i.e. the photos that were tossed in the garbage).  I could go on and on and on.   … I stayed at the bar until 1AM talking about your film and how we need to get others to experience it....You gave each of us who saw your film a gift, and I thank you.”     - Alton via email

PROJECT IMPACT – DDFR: Post-Brooklyn College Engagement,

"Thank you to Thomas Allen Harris and his crew for reminding us how and why real people make real history every day. While DDFR encourages us to opens our hearts and our minds to own personal history, sharing our these experiences in front of an audience of our colleagues, friends, and family members opens us to a much wider human experience. That we can share and admire why we are historically and culturally unique as we behold and treasure our affinities as human beings is, for this participant, the wondrous balance created by DDFR. ... History will never be the same in these parts."     - Steve via email

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us to spread the word about Through A Lens Darkly and Digital Diaspora Family Reunion. Tell you friends, share on social media, send the link for the campaign to your contact lists and follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

If you know of organizations or community groups, schools or colleges, people or collaborators we should speak with; or know places that we should screen the film, host a discussion or bring the DDFR Roadshow, contact us, we play well with others!

story:
Community Chest Thrift Shop Summary

My name is Jeffrey Schoettlin and my Wife's name is Ashlie. We're intensely passionate about helping and volunteering in the realm of Special Needs. We've been serving in the Special Needs Ministry at Calvary Community Church in Westlake Village, California for over three years. During that three year time-period we've noticed a large void in our community and we think our calling is to fill that void. There are several thrift stores in the area and they all serve good causes but... there are no thrift shops that represent or contribute to those impacted by Special Needs. That's a problem! We can change the community dynamic and open the most unique thrift shop in Moorpark, called Community Chest with your help! As a side note, although our thrift shop will be based in Moorpark, CA, our impact will reach far beyond the city borders. Read below to see who we intend to donate our proceeds to.

What We Need To Get Started

As listed in the title area, we're looking to raise $40,000.00 USD. This will allow us to pay for the following expenses and leave some breathing room, in the event that business starts off slow.

* Non-Profit Organization registration in the state of California, attorney fees for non-profit setup & 501 (c)(3) application. $948.00

* City licensing, permit and inspection fees. $6,063.00

* Initial lease payment and deposit. $900.00/month for lease, $1,800.00 deposit

* Leasehold improvements. TBD

* Furniture, fixtures and equipment. TBD

* Used but reliable truck to pick up donations. $7,000.00-$9,000.00

* Working Capital. TBD

* Utilities security deposits. TBD

* Opening Supplies (Register, toiletries, cleaning, tools, hangers, etc.) TBD

* Marketing Budget. TBD

* Launch online store. TBD

* Miscellaneous and unforeseen costs. TBD

Who We Plan To Donate To

* Moorpark Unified School District

* Calvary Community Church Special Needs Ministry

* Nathaniel's Hope (Buddy Break)

* Joni & Friends

* Autism Speaks

* Global Down Syndrome Foundation

If any of you have additional suggestions, we would love your input.

In The Event We Don't Get Full Funding

Although not getting fully funded, would present some challenges, we still plan to proceed forward with the donations we receive. The dollar amount collected will determine the level of impact we'll be able to have, in reference to the special needs community. So... please find it in your heart to donate what you can! If everyone who has visited the campaign so far donated $5.00...we would be halfway there!

The Impact

In today's society, chances are you either know someone who's impacted by special needs or have a child/adult with special needs in your home. As the numbers and demand for services increase, our state run programs cannot seem to keep pace. Although we'll just start off with one thrift shop, we fully intend to take our cause nationwide, one thrift shop at a time, with your continued support. Before we rattle off the startling statistics, I'd like to commend the following states, for their commitment to improving the lives of those living with Autism.

From the Autism Speaks Website:

"Thousands of children with autism now have access to new or enhanced insurance benefits to cover behavioral health treatment and physical, occupational and speech therapies in six states with the start of the new year."

Thanks for taking action Washington, Oregon, Nebraska, Kansas, Maryland and Maine! Lets all push our lawmakers in our respective states, to pass similar laws. Anything less than all 50 states is unacceptable!

Statistics:
In 2000... 1 in 150 were diagnosed with ASD (Autism Spectrum Disorder)
In 2010... the alarming number was 1 in 68 diagnosed with ASD

From the CDC Website:

As of 2010...

About 1 in 6 children in the United States had a developmental disability in 2006-2008, ranging from mild disabilities such as speech and language impairments to serious developmental disabilities, such as intellectual disabilities, cerebral palsy, and autism.

ASD is almost 5 times more common among boys (1 in 42) than among girls (1 in 189).

Please join us in contributing to those in need and lets all work together to get these staggering numbers under control.

Marketing Objectives

*Maintain a committed program for divesting the shop’s inventories through online distribution channels.

*Implement a local campaign with the shop’s targeted market via the use of flyers, local newspaper advertisements and word of mouth.

*Develop an online presence by developing a website and placing the shop’s name and contact information with online directories.

Marketing Strategies

Community Chest intends on using a number of marketing strategies that will allow the shop to easily target men and women within the designated market. These strategies include traditional print advertisements, social media outlets and ads placed on search engines on the Internet. Below is a description of how the NPO intends to market its services to the general public. The shop will also use an Internet based strategy. This is very important as many people seeking local services, such as vintage or used merchandise, now use the Internet to conduct their preliminary searches. Community Chest will register the shop with online portals so that potential customers can easily reach the shop business. The shop will also develop its own website. The shop will maintain a sizable amount of print and traditional advertising methods within local markets to promote the vintage merchandise the shop is selling. Additionally, the shop will maintain extensive online distribution channels that allow the NPO to make divestitures of thrift shop clothing on an online basis, by producing listings on eBay and Etsy.com. This will allow the shop to maintain a nationwide distribution channel(s) that allows acquired inventories of the thrift shop to be immediately sold among people within the United States and abroad. This is one of the key aspects to maintaining the profitability and cash flow of the NPO as the thrift shop progresses through it operations.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute and we understand times are tough. But... that doesn't mean you can't help. Without you, it's extremely difficult to get the word out. So if you think this is a worthy cause but can't contribute monetarily, please send this page to others. Also, if you feel helping out in the store, as a volunteer is your calling, we'd welcome you with open arms.

* Once established... donating your unwanted stuff, if you live in the area, would be a huge help! All donations will be tax deductible once the NPO is established.

within local markets to promote the vintage merchandise the shop is selling. Additionally,
the shop will maintain extensive online distribution channels that allow the NPO to make divestitures of thrift shop clothing on an online basis, by
producing listings on eBay and Etsy.com. This will allow the shop to maintain
a nationwide distribution channel(s) that allows acquired inventories of the thrift
shop to be immediately sold among people within the United States and abroad.
This is one of the key aspects to maintaining the profitability and cash flow
of the NPO as the thrift shop progresses through it operations.
  Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute and we understand times are tough. But... that doesn't mean you can't help. Without you, it's extremely difficult to get the word out. So if you think this is a worthy cause but can't contribute monetarily, please send this page to others. Also, if you feel helping out in the store, as a volunteer is your calling, we'd welcome you with open arms.* Once established... donating your unwanted stuff, if you live in the area, would be a huge help! All donations will be tax deductible once the NPO is established.

story:
HELP US BUY A 

REPLICA FARRARI F430

Mr Anthony Dillon & Mr Pete Ball

Setting up a Replica Car Hire? We Need a Car.

  • Capital to purchase 1 Replica Super Cars.
  • Capital to Insure and store the Super Cars.
  • Capital to market the business.

What You Get

Break down.

  • Or just donate anything from £5 towards our dream.

The Impact

The difference Your contribution will make:

  • Purchase a High Class Replica versions of the real versions.
  • Our Hire & Insurance fees are 70% Cheaper to than a real Super car.
  • A replica costs between £10,000 to £30,000 each
  • The real versions of the above cars cost over £180000 each.
  • Most real super cars are out of the reach of the average person.
  • We will bring affordable super cars at a price people can afford.

Risks & Challenges

 risks and obstacles We may face on the way to achieving our goal.

  • Being unable to raise enough funds to purchase the 1st car.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just contribute, 

  • Just donate any capital you can to help this dream become real.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
One Equal Share

                                            - A Time Exchange -

                                         

Are there things on your To Do list that just never seem to get done?  Are there errands or other tasks you wish someone else could take off your plate, or some service you need or would like to try?  Do you 'volunteer' and feel your hard work is taken for granted? Do you have a skill or passion that you would share with others if you had the time?

Time Exchange is a powerful tool for tapping into the human resources all around us that often go unseen or unrecognized.  We are all assets. We all have something we can share with another.  One Equal Share is a member-based Time Exchange that gives each of us the opportunity to offer our talents and service to other members for time credit.  Each hour of service = 1 credit.  Credits can be received from one member and used with another. Money only changes hands in an exchange when its for reimbursement of supplies.  And members are always in control of their time and the number of services they participate in.   We connect.  We share.  We help each other.  We create community.  


What kinds of service?  As long as its legal, the possibilities are endless:  

  • Tech wizard Roger helps Jane with her computer issues.  
  • Roger uses his credits to get some work done on his car by Al.  Al has been working on cars since he was a kid.  
  • Al gets some business advice from Bernice, a successful business owner herself.  
  • Bernice needs a ride to the airport, and for Andrea its on her way.  
  • Andrea needs some tutoring for her child, and Barbara, a retired teacher, is happy to help.  
  • Barbara has always loved the idea of going for a hike out at Red Rock, but doesn't know where to go.  Tony hikes every weekend and is happy to be her guide.  

               ...It so it goes...


[One of our members sharing his talent as a DJ.]


Time Exchange members are from every walk of life: teachers and students, doctors and healthcare workers, handymen, attorneys, plumbers, hair stylists, office workers and more.  Businesses and Non-profits can be members too.  The more the merrier!  More members means more types of services and more opportunities for exchange.  It's old fashioned neighborly service - with a twist.  All exchanges are tracked on our member's only exchange site.  This means we add balance, accountability, and reciprocity to the mix.  


Give Now

Share with Your Social Media Network


So if exchanges are all for time credit, why do we need this campaign?  Time Exchange is an important and valuable complementary economic system, but we still operate in a traditional world.  To support our current members and to continue to grow our organization we use staff, phones and computer systems, printing, marketing, office space, pay taxes and licensing fees, etc.   We started our Pilot Program in the fall of 2012.  We have been sustained by thousands of hours of hard work from our founder and members, and financially by membership dues, gifts from a few hundred dollars up to $13,000, and in Sept. 2013 we received a grant of $7,500 from Royal Neighbors Nation of Neighbors Program.


 We have been building our infrastructure and have systems in place.  We have learned what works and what doesn't, and are just about ready for our next big steps.  We are preparing to take the organization to a larger and more prominent level.  We are seeking a combined total of $10,000 (or more) from our friends, fans, friends of friends, and people who see the importance and value of what we are creating.  Be our bridge to that next step!  All contributions are welcome, but we hope you'll enjoy the perks we're offering at special levels.  

Give Now

 Share with Your Social Media Network


One Equal Share is the first Time Exchange in Nevada, but Time Exchange is not new. There are now some 435 time banks across the US, with more than 27,250 members who have exchanged more than 1,314,600 hours of service.  This is a tested system.   Time bank members  across the country

  • Feel valued, happier and less stressed
  • Get needs met without neediness or guilt
  • Try new things
  • Make new friends and build trusted new relationships
  • Help others with things they find rewarding
  • Budgets go further
  • Unemployed and underemployed, young and old stay active and involved
  • Busy people get support and can find themselves with new free time
Time banking is changing lives...

Our Member Jodi Ann says:
 "I have met many wonderful people.  I've gotten help with my household appliances and gotten rides to appointments.  I've had an opportunity to share my talents with people that otherwise wouldn't have known about my service.  I love that everyone's time is of the same value. It helps to create a community of mutual respect! So happy that this concept was introduced to me!" 

    ...and you can find more member stories on our website! 


What else do we have?  You can find lots of information about us and about Time Exchange in general on our public website at: www.1EqualShare.com.  We also have a member's only exchange site where members post their profiles and offers, and can search for requests they might support.  Our monthly Getting-to-Know-You (GTKY) events give members and guests an opportunity to meet in person; and they may even  discover their next best exchange.  GTKY potlucks and events are posted on our Calendar page and announced on Facebook (Be sure to 'Like' us!).  We have an app for our member's mobile devices, and we're creating an easy access YouTube version of our new member Orientation.  We also do a preliminary screening of all of our member applicants.  Check us out.  Support us!  Join us! 


 Give Now

Share with Your Social Media Network



And Thank You, Thank You, Thank You!  
We are grateful for your support.

story:
On buildwares you will find top brands competing to deliver best products, price comparison, free shipping and more


Our Story

Onsite shopping in India for Construction and home improvement always leaves a bad taste at the end of the day because of the confusion that is prevalent. Often times the strain of traveling in dense traffic, milling with people in small dusty lanes under the scorching heat plays havoc on one’s health. It is easy to experience, dehydration, lack of appetite and dust filled lungs after each trip that impedes their productivity at work and the time well spent with family.

Buildwares is an attempt to dramatically change this experience by empowering home buyers with tools to plan their construction/improvement projects from the comfort of their Home/workplace without disrupting their daily schedule. One such tool is Augmented reality, that gives the BW consumer direct product information and help them make better purchasing decisions.

It is our way to contribute to the well being of humanity by easing the buying process.


Who benefits from Buildwares.com?

Probable personas that derive the most benefits from our online marketplace. By no means is this a conclusive list. We endeavour to work with people from different walks of life and improve experience for every one


Background

  • Team of 5 with experience in software development, building architecture, build hardware, sales and marketing industry. 
  • Our team has bootstrapped development of buildwares and the project is live today thanks to support from everyone connected with the project.
  • Our team spends several hours in a day is spent in carefully selecting and onboarding vendors on our platform.
  • Lack of information in the market, unavailability of price comparison tools and planners make it a bit hard to make right choices and often one is dependent on an influencer
  • Buildwares aims to solve these problem by delivering this information into your hands as well as bring the goodwill of all our vendors, best known brands and service providers all on a single platform


Crowd funding campaign



By taking the crowd-funding route our team at buildwares.com aims to achieve total customer orientation and develop life long relationships with our patrons and customers. This is our philosophy and backing by our own customers allows us to be truthful to what we have set out to become

Funds raised from this campaign will help us build mobile tools that give the users the ability to visualize their homes with the product selected from our catalogs

Buildwares is a customer oriented company. Every policy that we make or every decision that we take, we keep our customers as the focal point and think of ways to bring benefits to them. We aim to be the most customer friendly organization in the world

In order to get there we are building several tools that will help empower our customers to make a choice in a very convenient and sophisticated manner. Our team is already working on developing apps that help you plan and execute your construction, home improvement and various other home needs as easily as clicking of a button.

Our technology is ready, website is live and vendors are ready to ship top brands, high quality products at lowest prices. We are now building apps for you that will elevate your shopping experience to new levels.

Through this crowd funding campaign we want to appeal to all our prospective customers to back us financially and more importantly allow us to develop a lifelong relationships with all our backers. We need your support to better understand your needs. Buildwares will always be known as a company co-founded by its customers, for the benefit of customers.


Current and Upcoming Categories on Buildwares

  • Architectural Hardware
  • Door & Window Hardware
  • Hinges
  • Door Handles
  • Glass Hardware
  • Furniture Hardware
  • Kitchen
  • Kitchen Appliances
  • Chimneys
  • Cooktops
  • Dishwashers
  • Built-in Microwaves
  • Built-in Ovens
  • Exhaust Fans
  • Kitchen Accessories
  • Bathroom
  • Security & Automation
  • Home & Office Security
  • Video Door Phone
  • Intouch Baby Watch
  • Home Alarm System
  • Digital Peep Hole
  • CCTV (Analog)
  • CCTV Surveillance Kit
  • Finger Print Lock
  • Home Automation
  • Electrical Supplies
  • Green Homes
  • Wall Cladding
  • Stone Wall Cladding
  • Doors
  • Fibreglass Composite Door
  • Membrane Door
  • Micro Coated Door
  • Pooja Door
  • Teak Wood Door
  • Vineer Laminated Door
  • Sliding Window
  • Casement Window
  • French Window
  • Lowers Window


What We Need & What You Get

We have embarked on a crowd funding campaign to fund our priority initiatives such as useful mobile tool development for planning and purchases management, enhance shopping experience to our users, bring best products and services at lower prices and improve efficient delivery mechanisms.

WIth this crowd funding campaign we aim to raise $10000. Funds are going to be utilized as per plan and a chart below explains the same



What if Goal is not met?

If in case our goal is not met, we will continue to work hard to build the platform and bring to people convenience. If the funds are short we will utilize any funds raised in reaching out to more vendors and additionally spend the money in web traffic generation which may give us advertising dollars that can be utilized to fund out initiative.


The Impact of your contribution

  • In india, for the first time Consumers get the ability to access transparent pricing on building materials, no need for stressful travel from shop to shop to compare prices and buy,

  • Architects have the ability to compare and visualize each hardware and build a solid proposal for green field projects

  • Designers get the ability to check technical specifications and information on quality before recommending brands to their clients.

  • Builders have the ability to access catalog, designs and place request for quotes in a single platform rather than calling each brand/company for quotes

Perks

Note:
a) Additional Discount = Special discount applied over and above any other promotions and offers running in the store
b) We are grateful to every single contributor and have created a special 'Thank You' page on our website. Each contributor is mentioned on the page
c) Period of 2 years to be calculated from the time of first purchase
1. One time 5% additional discount on any purchase via buildwares.com

2. 5% additional discount for any number of purchase over a period of 2 years

3. 5% additional discount  for any number of purchases over a period of 2 years and in addition a discount voucher worth $50 or INR3000 valid for a single purchase

4. 5% additional discount  for any number of purchases over a period of 2 years and in addition a discount voucher worth $100 or INR6000 valid for a single purchase

5. 5% additional discount  for any number of purchases over a period of 2 years and in addition a discount voucher worth $250 or INR15000 valid for a single purchase

6. 5% additional discount  for life time and in addition a discount voucher worth $500 or INR30000 valid for a single purchase

Buildwares Roadmap in 2015

We have come this far in the year 2014 by continuously taking feedback from a group of industry professionals. Our team proposes the following road-map for the year 2015 to deliver promised outcomes to all our customers. We start shipping in the first quarter of 2015


Risks & Challenges

Risks: India has no dedicated e-commerce laws. Indian consumers are used to receiving deep discounts that have been labelled as predatory pricing by offline traders and businesses.


Other Ways You Can Help

This project needs all the support you can give. Please support us by spreading the word using your facebook/twitter or indiegogo sharing tools

Thank You :)

story: Himalayan Salt Creations is a business that is completely focused on healing people, body, mind, & soul, young or old, and from any income bracket.  In fact, we give as much product away to people who can't afford it as we sell.  I learned about Himalayan Salt from my Dr..  she was very open to natural remedies.  I have Lupus and I spent the better part of 3 years in bed more than out of bed and I was taking upwards of 15 different medications each day. After I used the Himalayan Salt successfully, I knew that the best blessing I could give others like me, was a way to improve their quality of life through the use of Himalayan Salt Products.  We did just that and with lots of help from the community and very special people, we built our first 14x14 salt cave in 2012/2013 (you can see the video of our first cave on our Facebook Page, website and YouTube).  But this summer our building was sold and we had to move.  We lost our Himalayan Salt Cave.  Our Himalayan Salt Cave had tremendous healing properties for everyone who came to use it.  The cave was an important part of many peoples everyday life.  Even if you are healthy, by sitting in the Himalayan Salt Cave, it will help to keep you from getting everyday illnesses such as a cold or the flu.  Equally important is the Salt Cave helps people who are not healthy.  People with Allergies, Sinus Problem, Asthma, even Emphysema and COPD.  People who suffer from pain, back pain, knee pain, headaches, migraines, absolutely any body pain.  Many of our people who use the Salt Cave have Psoriatic Arthritis, Eczema, Psoriasis, Cancer, or Fibromyalgia.  The Salt is also shown to help mental disorders such as depression and ADD.  Sitting in the Salt Cave gives a calmness to everyday stress from our busy lives.  Many people come on their lunch hour to distress and have a few minutes of meditation.  Your donation, no matter how small will help us finish the Salt Cave and purchase the remaining salt needed from Pakistan to finish the cave and help people from all over the Midwest.  We get bus tours from all over the Midwest filled with people who come to learn about Himalayan Salt and how it can help them or a loved one.  We get tours from local senior groups, homemaker groups, Red Hat groups, children from local schools and many area families.  Right now the Salt Cave is not operational and the phone rings at least six times a day from people wanting to know if the "Cave" is open.  As you can see in our video, 3 of the 4 walls are now covered in salt.   There is a lot left to do.  Both doors have to be bought and installed, heaters have to be put in to heat the salt, the ceiling needs completed and the floor needs covered with salt.  The salt for the floor will be approximately 3-4 inches deep and that will require over (100) 50 pound bags of fine and coarse grind salt at $30 per bag.  We are also building a 6 foot by 4 foot heated salt bed for people to lay on.  There will be an Infrared Heat Mat placed about 3 inches below the salt.  Infrared is the latest technology for healing and will help many people with pain of any kind.  There will be a water fountain giving the peaceful trickle of water to help people relax and enjoy their time in the Salt Cave.  Your donation will put us that much closer to completing the "Cave" and help 100's of people.  We will post update pictures of the Salt Cave each week so that everyone can see it's progress.  We have also posted a video of our first Himalayan Salt Cave and it contains pictures of that cave and detailed information about Himalayan Salt and how it can help you or someone you know or love.  Please help us help others!
story_txt: Himalayan Salt Creations is a business that is completely focused on healing people, body, mind, & soul, young or old, and from any income bracket.  In fact, we give as much product away to people who can't afford it as we sell.  I learned about Himalayan Salt from my Dr..  she was very open to natural remedies.  I have Lupus and I spent the better part of 3 years in bed more than out of bed and I was taking upwards of 15 different medications each day. After I used the Himalayan Salt successfully, I knew that the best blessing I could give others like me, was a way to improve their quality of life through the use of Himalayan Salt Products.  We did just that and with lots of help from the community and very special people, we built our first 14x14 salt cave in 2012/2013 (you can see the video of our first cave on our Facebook Page, website and YouTube).  But this summer our building was sold and we had to move.  We lost our Himalayan Salt Cave.  Our Himalayan Salt Cave had tremendous healing properties for everyone who came to use it.  The cave was an important part of many peoples everyday life.  Even if you are healthy, by sitting in the Himalayan Salt Cave, it will help to keep you from getting everyday illnesses such as a cold or the flu.  Equally important is the Salt Cave helps people who are not healthy.  People with Allergies, Sinus Problem, Asthma, even Emphysema and COPD.  People who suffer from pain, back pain, knee pain, headaches, migraines, absolutely any body pain.  Many of our people who use the Salt Cave have Psoriatic Arthritis, Eczema, Psoriasis, Cancer, or Fibromyalgia.  The Salt is also shown to help mental disorders such as depression and ADD.  Sitting in the Salt Cave gives a calmness to everyday stress from our busy lives.  Many people come on their lunch hour to distress and have a few minutes of meditation.  Your donation, no matter how small will help us finish the Salt Cave and purchase the remaining salt needed from Pakistan to finish the cave and help people from all over the Midwest.  We get bus tours from all over the Midwest filled with people who come to learn about Himalayan Salt and how it can help them or a loved one.  We get tours from local senior groups, homemaker groups, Red Hat groups, children from local schools and many area families.  Right now the Salt Cave is not operational and the phone rings at least six times a day from people wanting to know if the "Cave" is open.  As you can see in our video, 3 of the 4 walls are now covered in salt.   There is a lot left to do.  Both doors have to be bought and installed, heaters have to be put in to heat the salt, the ceiling needs completed and the floor needs covered with salt.  The salt for the floor will be approximately 3-4 inches deep and that will require over (100) 50 pound bags of fine and coarse grind salt at $30 per bag.  We are also building a 6 foot by 4 foot heated salt bed for people to lay on.  There will be an Infrared Heat Mat placed about 3 inches below the salt.  Infrared is the latest technology for healing and will help many people with pain of any kind.  There will be a water fountain giving the peaceful trickle of water to help people relax and enjoy their time in the Salt Cave.  Your donation will put us that much closer to completing the "Cave" and help 100's of people.  We will post update pictures of the Salt Cave each week so that everyone can see it's progress.  We have also posted a video of our first Himalayan Salt Cave and it contains pictures of that cave and detailed information about Himalayan Salt and how it can help you or someone you know or love.  Please help us help others!

story:
Our Story

When we are a consumer in a market we don’t fully understand it can seem daunting, foreign and even scary.  Especially when they purchase involves a large sum of money, safety and maintenance.  We are talking about the buying, selling and maintaining of a vehicle.  For women and non-car enthusiasts anything that involves a car can seem impossible and that is why we have created: NuQarta.  NuQarta is a platform that is tailored to your needs, whether it be buying, selling or maintaining your car.  It will tailor the information based on your specific needs!

  1. Do you ever think about getting a new car but don’t even want to start the process?
  2. Do you want to sell your car online to eliminate high dealership prices but don’t know how?
  3. Are you interested in fixing that nagging car problem but don’t have the time to do the research?

If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…


A word from the co-founders

"NuQarta was born after experimenting the harsh work of helping our family members and our girlfriends to find their cars. The problem was not to find a car, but to find the right car. I realized that the real concerned was to find a good vehicle at the right price which will not be too expensive to maintain and be fuel efficient. The bottom line is that it's the whole process that was really hard for people who don't know anything about cars. I'm talking about finding the information of the car that fits your needs, then finding the cars at the right price, and finally maintain your car at the right places to keep your costs low. We're creating a platform where you can get all at the same place and contrary to the other website dedicated to car ads and sales, our platform will be useful even when you buy your car; finally,  NuQarta is a tool throughout the driver's life."            

                                                                    Edson Aristil & Benz W. Figaro

                       

Overview

"Our popular culture reinforces the idea that women are less capable than men when it comes to buying and selling cars. We're out to change that fallacious idea one “NuQarta” account at a time! Help us establish a platform to serve people in need of information. The information delivered by “NuQarta” to an individual can change their ideas about what they can accomplish for the rest of his or her life when they are informed and knowledgeable on their car purchases.  Finding out your OUTCOME with ease will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this project today!"

More about the Project

“It’s important to treat female car shoppers as your market and not a market segment. They are as important to your success as the male demographic. They’re important individually as car buyers, and they are profoundly important in influencing their partner’s choice of car. According to Forbes, women influence 85% of car-buying decisions and in 2012, they purchased nearly 40% of both used- and new cars.– This fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision “NuQarta” and all the possible features we could bring to people:

  • Sell and research vehicle
  • Getting information, tips, advices about the car industry (choosing insurance, maintain your vehicle, buy[negotiating] a car at dealership, etc.)
  • Getting the best garages, car wash, and other service provider according to the preferences of the members
  • Have targeted offers to save in their vehicle maintenance cost
  • An simple and user-friendly platform that gives accurate results
  • Getting ads that fits your field of interest
"With NuQarta your results will be completely adapted to your profile (field of interest, needs, location, etc.).... Imagine, getting results (ads, car search, information, car service providers) based on your needs only!"


It's the perfect tool for both users and businesses!

When reviewing these benefits and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a business that needs to be created. We feel these features will make us incredibly qualified to succeed.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us the leader in the industry. Our mission is to take care of every customer and member with the upmost respect and care.  We feel this will be the key to our members AND customers retention.

"NuQarta distinguishes itself by the variety of the services it offers. On top of helping you find and sell cars easily, our team educates the users. We offer driving courses, all year long, and car care clinics for women. Those clinics provide a basic knowledge of simple mechanics to drivers in order to widen their skills which make them more resourceful if ever a problem occurs." 
                                                                                       Marie Laurence Paquin


NuQarBox

The NuQarBox is an access to all the savings for your car maintenance costs. People spends an average of 1000$ per year to maintain their car:

You don't know where to go in order to save?

Stop searching! NuQarta comes up with the NuQarBox solution where all your car related business is offering deals that will makes you save up to 70%. Stop being bombarded every single day with deals... And on top of that with deals that don't even in your interest fields. And finally Stop getting played by the industry and start getting more for what you pay.

Saving with the NuQarBox is simple as 1...2...3...

1) How do you want to be notice?

  • Email
  • Personal Account
  • Mobile application

2) Five for the price of one!

  • Choose deals that fits your needs among a variety of choices

3) Take your time and enjoy!

  • Start saving hundreds of dollars on car products and services
The NuQarBox will be ready two months after our Launching date. Make sure to signup at launch so you can get the updates and start saving!

About Us

Our company is passionate with creating an unmatched platform for learning about vehicle market information. Unfortunately we have noticed when companies design new concepts they contain preliminary flaws but our goal is to stay dedicated to quality because we know your money is at stake! We have engineered a unique method and user-friendly results that is second to none. Not only that, but they are more affordable so do not have to worry about it being price prohibitive. Help us make this a reality and let’s get learning for less!

NuQarta homepage:

NuQarta! Make buying, selling or maintaining your car simple, easy and accurate!


How You Can Help

For us to bring the “NuQarta” to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, design and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “NuQarta”.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the “NuQarta”, to further customize the first version of the “NuQarta” and create additional products and services that will complement “NuQarta”.

The “NuQarta” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

How We'll Use the Funds

We need about 25 000$ in order to break “NuQarta” onto the market. That will includes marketing, design, development and related expenses for start-up.


Giving Back : Charity FAQ

By contributing to NuQarta! The Online Destination For All Your Automobile Needs, you’ll ALSO help out a good cause! 10% of the total proceeds you contribute will be donated to two charities that we strongly believe in – Children’s Wish and Refuge in Action.

                       

What is each charity's mission?

Children’s Wish works with communities across Canada to provide children with life threatening illnesses the opportunity to realize their most heartfelt wish. By creating unique, meaningful experiences, Children’s Wish enhances quality of life for these courageous children and their families, please CLICK HERE

Refuge in Action is a new organisation that helps Montreal city community by providing food, education books, school bags and clothing to people in need. Their mojo is ‘’Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another’’, please CLICK HERE


NuQarta's Development Timeline

We'll have a NuQarta beta version for all backers who chose the "Early Access" perk and up in July.  We'll get feedback from you and implement changes and suggestions and follow up with a full public release in late Summer 2015.

Notice that this summer it will be the Canadian Public Release. The US full access version will be available in summer 2016.



Rewards & Perks for Your Support

In return for you support we’ve put together some amazing perks, including  free access to our NuQarBox and some limited edition of NuQarta's promotional accessories (including pens, T-shirts, licence plate, cristal keychains).



The NuQarta Crystal Keychain


The NuQarta pens



About the Team

We are a team of passionate business young people who love marketing, sales and automobile. We believe that it's time to have a platform where you can find everything you need for your automobile.


Reward & Reviews

NuQarta was the 1st prize winner of a Montreal contest  "The Entrepreneurial Passion"  for the better innovative start-up idea.


From left to right:
Edson Aristil (NuQarta co-founder), Mr. Robert Richard, (Montreal North Caisse Desjardins board of directors president) and Benz Figaro (NuQarta co-founder)

Here is what people are saying about our actual blog:

"First of all, what a great discovery! We find all kind of relevant information, advices that aim men and women. The articles are concise and I love it....."  Francis T.

"Amazing website to go on for advices and to find good information :)" Tony A.

“Hi I would like to thank you for all those relevant information that we find on your website...” Linda T.

Risk and challenges

Our challenges is to translate the content of our French blog into English. We want to keep the same content quality. We are confident that we will find automobile passionate to write article that are concise and easy to understand instead of very complicated terms from the expert language. Concerning the risk, is to keep the delivery date of the platform between July and August. When it comes to develop a web platform it's often hard to respect deadlines. Benz (the co-founder) has five years experience in project management. We are counting on his experience to respect all development deadlines.


FAQ


Stretch Goal


Referral program

Refer 5 friends & get a 1 year NuQarBox access for FREE!

After your purchase, make sure you share your unique referral link with your friends and family. If 5 friends purchase through your unique referral link, you get a 1 year NuQarBox access for free! 

  1. Make sure you are logged into Indiegogo
  2. Click  to get your unique URL to share
  3. Or click the social share/ email button

You will find your referral link upon completing your purchase. For any questions about the referral program please email indiegogo@nuqarta.com.


Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters. Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “NuQarta” family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

Contact Information

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at indiegogo@nuqarta.com.

story:
Our story

With big dreams and a small budget, often times a collaborative effort is necessary.  An environment where everyone pulls together their resources to make something possible is the best way to make your dreams come true.  It just so happens Shower Caddy Stopper is the next best product that is a simple solution to a nagging problem and by buying right here on the Indiegogo site, you will help us make the “Shower Caddy Stopper” a household name.

Overview

"Our popular culture reinforces the idea that shower caddies are necessary to keep containers off the floor, but they are without a doubt flawed and frustrating.  Then you add in the elements of a shower or bath: humidity, water, crying kids, slippery soap, and you have the recipe for disaster.  Well, we're out to change this situation one Shower Caddy Stopper at a time! Help us establish a product to serve showering people in need everywhere. As little as $6 gets a Shower Caddy Stopper to an individual and can change the way they start and finish their day, everyday.  Finding out your shower caddy can stay in place with ease will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this project today!"

More about the Project

Researchers at San Diego State University found that the film of soap scum that develops on vinyl shower curtains and shower floors can play host to a number of germs, including Methylobacterium, a group of bacteria that can cause infections. To reduce germs on soap bottles, it is best to keep them in a separate container and wash regularly to remove soap scum; stubborn residue might need a more abrasive scrubbing sponge and an antibacterial cleaner. Therefore there is no doubt there is a need for the shower caddy and it is a great product but it doesn't stand a chance against the slippery slope of your shower head. – This fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision the Shower Caddy Stopper and all the possible benefits we could bring to people.

When reviewing these benefits and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a business that needs to be created. We feel these features will make us incredibly qualified to succeed.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us the leader in the industry. Our mission is to take care of every customer and staff member with the utmost respect and care.  We feel this will be the key to our customer AND staff retention.

About Us

Our company is passionate with creating an unmatched bathroom solution that’s simple and effective for your bathroom. Unfortunately we have noticed when companies design new concepts they contain preliminary flaws but our goal is to stay dedicated to quality because we know your bathroom sanity is at stake! We have engineered a unique method and user-friendly application that is second to none. Not only that, but they are more affordable so we do not have to worry about it being price prohibitive. Help us make this a reality and let’s get the Shower Caddy Stopper in place for less!

How You Can Help

For us to bring the Shower Caddy Stopper to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the Shower Caddy Stopper.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the Shower Caddy Stopper, to further customize the first version of the Shower Caddy Stopper and create additional products and services that will compliment Shower Caddy Stopper.

The Shower Caddy Stopper needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

How We'll Use the Funds

We need about $20,000 in order to break the Shower Caddy Stopper onto the market. That will include a much needed packaging upgrade, marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up.

Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our Shower Caddy Stopper family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at info@caddystopper.com
story_txt:
Our story
With
big dreams and a small budget, often times a collaborative effort is
necessary.  An environment where everyone
pulls together their resources to make something possible is the best way to
make your dreams come true.  It just so
happens Shower Caddy Stopper is the next best product that is a simple solution
to a nagging problem and by buying right here on the Indiegogo site, you will help us make the “Shower Caddy Stopper” a household
name.Overview
"Our
popular culture reinforces the idea that shower caddies are necessary to keep
containers off the floor, but they are without a doubt flawed and frustrating.  Then you add in the elements of a shower or
bath: humidity, water, crying kids, slippery soap, and you have the recipe for
disaster.  Well, we're out to change this
situation one Shower Caddy Stopper at a time! Help us establish a product to
serve showering people in need everywhere. As little as $6 gets a Shower
Caddy Stopper to an individual and can change the way they start and finish
their day, everyday.  Finding out your shower
caddy can stay in place with ease
will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a
donation to this project today!"More about
the Project
Researchers at San Diego
State University found that the film of soap scum that develops on vinyl shower
curtains and shower floors can play host to a number of germs, including
Methylobacterium, a group of bacteria that can cause infections. To reduce
germs on soap bottles, it is best to keep them in a separate container and wash
regularly to remove soap scum; stubborn residue might need a more abrasive
scrubbing sponge and an antibacterial cleaner. Therefore there is no doubt
there is a need for the shower caddy and it is a great product but it doesn't
stand a chance against the slippery slope of your shower head. – This fact prompted us to dig deeper
into a solution.  This is where we
started to envision the Shower Caddy Stopper and all the possible benefits we could
bring to people.
When reviewing these
benefits and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a business that
needs to be created. We feel these features will make us incredibly qualified
to succeed.  This paired with attention
to detail and quality service will make us the leader in the industry. Our
mission is to take care of every customer and staff member with the utmost
respect and care.  We feel this will be
the key to our customer AND staff retention.About Us
Our company is
passionate with creating an unmatched bathroom solution that’s simple and effective for
your bathroom. Unfortunately
we have noticed when companies design new concepts they contain preliminary
flaws but our goal is to stay dedicated to quality because we know your bathroom
sanity is at stake! We have engineered a unique method
and user-friendly application that is second to none. Not only that, but they
are more affordable so we do not have to worry about it being price prohibitive.
Help us make this a reality and let’s get the Shower Caddy Stopper in place for less!How You Can
Help
For us to bring the Shower Caddy
Stopper to life, we need your support!
Your generous funding will help us get
things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost
of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get
the chance to be one of the first users of the Shower Caddy Stopper.  We will also use our funding to test our
concept to make it better.  We are
committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best
possible solutions.
We will also be using the funding to
expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise
solutions of the Shower Caddy Stopper, to further customize the first version
of the Shower Caddy Stopper and create additional products and services that
will compliment Shower Caddy Stopper.
The Shower Caddy Stopper needs pledging
but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as
much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media
buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us
spread the word and get things started!How We'll Use
the Funds
We need about $20,000 in order to break the Shower Caddy Stopper onto the market.
That will include a much needed packaging upgrade, marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up.
Final Thank
You and Links
We feel so grateful to everyone who has
taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they
could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working
hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute
thanks to all our generous supporters. 
Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what
your donation helped us achieve.  You are
part of our Shower Caddy Stopper family.
